./  ADD  SSI=71030226,NAME=IEAVRT00
         TITLE 'TTIMER/STIMER RTN -MODULE IEAVRT00 -CSECT IGC0004F     *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGC0004F CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT BALR  @15,0                                               0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL2(@EP00001-@MAINENT-2)                                 00007000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00008000
         DC    C'IGC0004F  77.103'                                 0001 00009000
IGC0004G BALR  @15,0                                               0001 00010000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00011000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00012000
         DC    AL2(@EP00257-IGC0004G-2)                                 00013000
         ENTRY IGC0004G                                                 00014000
         DROP  @15                                                      00015000
@PROLOG  BALR  @09,0                                               0001 00016000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00017000
         USING @PSTART,@09                                         0001 00018000
         AH    @15,4(,@15)                                         0001 00019000
         BR    @15                                                 0001 00020000
@EP00001 DS    0H                                                  0002 00021000
RBPRFXLN EQU 64                                                         00022000
RBPRFLNA EQU 32                                                         00023000
PRBLEN   EQU 136                                                        00024000
SIRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00025000
TIRBLEN  EQU 136                                                        00026000
IRBLEN   EQU 128                                                        00027000
SVRBLEN  EQU 224                                                        00028000
FIXSTART DS    0H                                                  0103 00029000
*   SAVR(1)=AREAPTR;                /* SAVE INPUT REGS               */ 00030000
         ST    AREAPTR,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                0104 00031000
*   SAVR(2)=CODERG;                 /* DO                            */ 00032000
         ST    CODERG,SAVR+4(,RBPTR)                               0105 00033000
*   SAVR(3)=RETADDR;                /* DO                            */ 00034000
         ST    RETADDR,SAVR+8(,RBPTR)                              0106 00035000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0107 00036000
*    (AREAPTR,                                                     0107 00037000
*     CODERG,                                                      0107 00038000
*     RETADDR) UNRSTD;                                             0107 00039000
*   XSAFLGS='00'X;                  /* INITIALIZE BIT FLAGS          */ 00040000
         MVI   XSAFLGS(RBPTR),X'00'                                0108 00041000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0109 00042000
*    (R0,                                                          0109 00043000
*     R1,                                                          0109 00044000
*     R7,                                                          0109 00045000
*     R13) RSTD;                    /*                       @Z40FPYB*/ 00046000
*   R1=ADDR(TTSTSTAE);              /* SET ESTAE ROUTINE ENTRY PT  0110 00047000
*                                                            @Z40FPYB*/ 00048000
         LA    R1,TTSTSTAE                                         0110 00049000
*   R7=ADDR(RBPRFX);                /* SET POINTER TO RB PREFIX    0111 00050000
*                                                            @Z40FPYB*/ 00051000
         LR    R7,RBPTR                                            0111 00052000
         SL    R7,@CF00214                                         0111 00053000
*   GENERATE CODE;                                                 0112 00054000
*                            /* ESTABLISH ESTAE COVERAGE    @Z40FPYB*/  00055000
    FESTAE EXITADR=(R1),RBADDR=(R7),PARAM=(RBPTR),                    CC00056000
               TCBADDR=(TCBPTR),RECORD=YES                              00057000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0113 00058000
*    (R0,                                                          0113 00059000
*     R1,                                                          0113 00060000
*     R7,                                                          0113 00061000
*     R13) UNRSTD;                  /*                       @Z40FPYB*/ 00062000
*   CVTREG=R3;                      /* SET PTR TO CVT                */ 00063000
         LR    CVTREG,R3                                           0114 00064000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0115 00065000
*    (R3) UNRSTD;                                                  0115 00066000
*   IF SAVR(2,31:31)='1'B           /* IF MIC UNITS REQUESTED        */ 00067000
*     THEN                          /* CLEAR OUT AREA FOR RESULTS    */ 00068000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000010'                           0116 00069000
         BNO   @RF00116                                            0116 00070000
*     DO;                                                          0117 00071000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0118 00072000
*        (KEYREG) RSTD;             /* INDICATE USER AREA STORE      */ 00073000
*       XSAUAREA='1'B;              /*                       @YM02417*/ 00074000
         OI    XSAUAREA(RBPTR),B'00001000'                         0119 00075000
*       DO;                         /* MODESET EXTKEY(RBT234)      0120 00076000
*                                      WORKREG(KEYREG)               */ 00077000
*         KEYREG=TCBRBP;            /* RB PTR FROM TCB               */ 00078000
         L     KEYREG,TCBRBP(,TCBPTR)                              0121 00079000
*         KEYREG=KEYREG->RBLINK;    /* NEXT RB ADDRESS               */ 00080000
         L     KEYREG,RBLINK(,KEYREG)                              0122 00081000
*         KEYREG=KEYREG->RBOPSW(2); /* PSW KEY FROM RB OLD PSW       */ 00082000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0123 00083000
         IC    @12,RBOPSW+1(,KEYREG)                               0123 00084000
         LR    KEYREG,@12                                          0123 00085000
*         SPKA(KEYREG);             /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00086000
         SPKA  0(KEYREG)                                           0124 00087000
*       END;                        /* MODESET EXTKEY(RBT234)      0125 00088000
*                                      WORKREG(KEYREG)               */ 00089000
*       AREA='0000000000000000'X;                                  0126 00090000
         L     @12,INPTR(,RBPTR)                                   0126 00091000
         MVC   AREA(8,@12),@CB02935                                0126 00092000
*       GENERATE                    /* RETURN TO PROTECT KEY 0       */ 00093000
*           (SPKA  0);                                             0127 00094000
         SPKA  0                                                        00095000
*       XSAUAREA='0'B;              /*                       @YM02417*/ 00096000
         NI    XSAUAREA(RBPTR),B'11110111'                         0128 00097000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0129 00098000
*        (KEYREG) UNRSTD;                                          0129 00099000
*     END;                                                         0130 00100000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0131 00101000
*    (R11,                                                         0131 00102000
*     R12,                                                         0131 00103000
*     R13,                                                         0131 00104000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0131 00105000
@RF00116 DS    0H                                                  0132 00106000
*   GEN(LA    TTSTBASE,0(0,TTSTBASE));/* CLEAR HIGH ORDER BYTE OF  0132 00107000
*                                      BASE REG FOR NEXT ADDRESS   0132 00108000
*                                      COMPARISON            @ZA02745*/ 00109000
         LA    TTSTBASE,0(0,TTSTBASE)                                   00110000
*   IF TTSTBASE¬<CVTNUCB THEN       /* IF MODULE NOT IN FIXED LPA  0133 00111000
*                                                            @ZA02745*/ 00112000
         C     TTSTBASE,CVTNUCB(,CVTREG)                           0133 00113000
         BL    @RF00133                                            0133 00114000
*     DO;                           /* PAGE FIX THE MODULE   @ZA02745*/ 00115000
*       R11=ADDR(FIXSTART);         /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00116000
         LA    R11,FIXSTART                                        0135 00117000
*       R12=ADDR(FIXEND);           /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00118000
         LA    R12,FIXEND                                          0136 00119000
*       R13=ADDR(PGFIXECB);         /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00120000
         LA    R13,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0137 00121000
*       PGFIXECB=0;                 /* INITIALIZE THE PGFIX ECB      */ 00122000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0138 00123000
         ST    @10,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0138 00124000
*       GENERATE(PGFIX R,A=(R11),EA=(R12),ECB=(R13),LONG=N);       0139 00125000
         PGFIX R,A=(R11),EA=(R12),ECB=(R13),LONG=N                      00126000
*       IF RETCODE=8 THEN           /*                       @ZA07160*/ 00127000
         C     RETCODE,@CF00036                                    0140 00128000
         BNE   @RF00140                                            0140 00129000
*         DO;                                                      0141 00130000
*           R13=ADDR(PGFIXECB);     /* SET REG FOR WAIT              */ 00131000
         LA    R13,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0142 00132000
*           GEN(WAIT  1,ECB=(R13)); /* WAIT FOR PAGE FIX             */ 00133000
         WAIT  1,ECB=(R13)                                              00134000
*         END;                                                     0144 00135000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA02745*/ 00136000
@RF00140 DS    0H                                                  0146 00137000
*   GENERATE REFS(PSALITA,FLC);                                    0146 00138000
@RF00133 DS    0H                                                  0146 00139000
*                             /* GET DISP LOCK */                       00140000
         SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=DISP,MODE=UNCOND,                        CC00141000
               RELATED=('TQE QUEUE',IEAVRT00(NONE,NONE,NONE))           00142000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0147 00143000
*    (R11,                                                         0147 00144000
*     R12,                                                         0147 00145000
*     R13,                                                         0147 00146000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0147 00147000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0148 00148000
*    (TQEPTR) RSTD;                                                0148 00149000
*   TQEPTR=TCBTME;                                                 0149 00150000
         L     TQEPTR,TCBTME(,TCBPTR)                              0149 00151000
*   IF TQEPTR=0|(TQEPTR¬=0&TQEOFF='1'B)/* IF THERE IS NO TQE ON QUEUE*/ 00152000
*     THEN                          /* RETURN ZERO INTERVAL LEFT     */ 00153000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0150 00154000
         CR    TQEPTR,@14                                          0150 00155000
         BE    @RT00150                                            0150 00156000
         CR    TQEPTR,@14                                          0150 00157000
         BE    @RF00150                                            0150 00158000
         TM    TQEOFF(TQEPTR),B'10000000'                          0150 00159000
         BNO   @RF00150                                            0150 00160000
@RT00150 DS    0H                                                  0151 00161000
*     DO;                           /* AND EIXT.                     */ 00162000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0152 00163000
*        (R11,                                                     0152 00164000
*         R12,                                                     0152 00165000
*         R13,                                                     0152 00166000
*         R14) RSTD;                                               0152 00167000
*       GENERATE;                                                  0153 00168000
           SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=DISP,                                 CC00169000
               RELATED=('TQE QUEUE',IEAVRT00(NONE))                     00170000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0154 00171000
*        (R11,                                                     0154 00172000
*         R12,                                                     0154 00173000
*         R13,                                                     0154 00174000
*         R14) UNRSTD;                                             0154 00175000
*       IF SAVR(2,31:31)¬='1'B      /* IF UNITS ARE TU               */ 00176000
*         THEN                      /* SET INTERVAL=0 IN SAVE        */ 00177000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000010'                           0155 00178000
         BO    @RF00155                                            0155 00179000
*         SAVR(1)=0;                /* FROM WHICH R0 IS RESTORED.    */ 00180000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0156 00181000
         ST    @14,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                    0156 00182000
*       RETCODE=0;                  /* SET SUCCESSFUL RETURN CODE    */ 00183000
@RF00155 SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0157 00184000
*     END;                                                         0158 00185000
*   ELSE                            /* HERE IF A TQE ON QUEUE        */ 00186000
*     DO;                                                          0159 00187000
         B     @RC00150                                            0159 00188000
@RF00150 DS    0H                                                  0160 00189000
*       IF TQETYPE='00'B            /* IF TQE IS TASK TYPE,          */ 00190000
*         THEN                      /* GET TASK TIME INTV LEFT       */ 00191000
         TM    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000011'                         0160 00192000
         BNZ   @RF00160                                            0160 00193000
*         DO;                                                      0161 00194000
*           IF PCCANUIN='0'B        /* IF CPU TIMER IS USABLE,       */ 00195000
*             THEN                  /* CPU TIMER HAS INTV LEFT.      */ 00196000
         L     @14,PCCAPTR                                         0162 00197000
         TM    PCCANUIN(@14),B'10000000'                           0162 00198000
         BNZ   @RF00162                                            0162 00199000
*             GENERATE              /* STORE THE CPU TIMER           */ 00200000
*                 (STPT INTV(RBPTR));                              0163 00201000
         STPT INTV(RBPTR)                                               00202000
*           ELSE                    /* IF NOT USABLE,                */ 00203000
*             INTV=TQEVAL;          /* TQEVAL HAS INTV LEFT          */ 00204000
         B     @RC00162                                            0164 00205000
@RF00162 MVC   INTV(8,RBPTR),TQEVAL(TQEPTR)                        0164 00206000
*           XSATMTYP='0'B;          /* INDICATE TASK TYPE INTV       */ 00207000
@RC00162 NI    XSATMTYP(RBPTR),B'01111111'                         0165 00208000
*         END;                                                     0166 00209000
*       ELSE                        /* IF REAL/WAIT TYPE,            */ 00210000
*         DO;                       /* INTV LEFT IS TQEVAL-TIME      */ 00211000
         B     @RC00160                                            0167 00212000
@RF00160 DS    0H                                                  0168 00213000
*           INTV=TQEVAL;            /* GET TQEVAL FOR NOW            */ 00214000
         MVC   INTV(8,RBPTR),TQEVAL(TQEPTR)                        0168 00215000
*           XSATMTYP='1'B;          /* INDICATE REAL/WAIT TYPE       */ 00216000
         OI    XSATMTYP(RBPTR),B'10000000'                         0169 00217000
*         END;                                                     0170 00218000
*       IF(TQETYPE='11'B|TQETYPE='00'B)&/* IF LEGAL CANCEL           */ 00219000
*           SAVR(2,32:32)='1'B THEN /* TQE MUST BE FREED.            */ 00220000
@RC00160 TM    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000011'                         0171 00221000
         BO    @GL00003                                            0171 00222000
         TM    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000011'                         0171 00223000
         BNZ   @RF00171                                            0171 00224000
@GL00003 TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000001'                           0171 00225000
         BNO   @RF00171                                            0171 00226000
*         DO;                                                      0172 00227000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0173 00228000
*            (R2) RSTD;             /* FIRST DEQ THE TQE FROM THE    */ 00229000
*           R2=ADDR(DEQRET1);       /* TIMER QUEUE BY MEANS OF       */ 00230000
         LA    R2,DEQRET1                                          0174 00231000
*           CALL DEQTQE;            /* THE TQE DEQ ROUTINE.          */ 00232000
         L     @15,CVTQTD00(,CVTREG)                               0175 00233000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0175 00234000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0176 00235000
*            (R11,                                                 0176 00236000
*             R12,                                                 0176 00237000
*             R13,                                                 0176 00238000
*             R14) RSTD;                                           0176 00239000
*DEQRET1:                                                          0177 00240000
*           TCBTME=0;                                              0177 00241000
DEQRET1  SLR   @10,@10                                             0177 00242000
         ST    @10,TCBTME(,TCBPTR)                                 0177 00243000
*           GENERATE;                                              0178 00244000
              SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=DISP,                              CC00245000
               RELATED=('TQE QUEUE',IEAVRT00(NONE))                     00246000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0179 00247000
*            (R11,                                                 0179 00248000
*             R12,                                                 0179 00249000
*             R13,                                                 0179 00250000
*             R14) UNRSTD;                                         0179 00251000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0180 00252000
*            (R2) UNRSTD;                                          0180 00253000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0181 00254000
*            (R0) RSTD;                                            0181 00255000
*           R0=128;                 /* FINALLY, FREE THE TQE         */ 00256000
         LA    R0,128                                              0182 00257000
*           IF TQETYPE='00'B        /* IF TASK TYPE,                 */ 00258000
*             THEN                  /* FROM LSQA (SP253)             */ 00259000
         TM    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000011'                         0183 00260000
         BNZ   @RF00183                                            0183 00261000
*             GENERATE(ICM  R0,8,LSQA);                            0184 00262000
         ICM  R0,8,LSQA                                                 00263000
*           ELSE                    /* HERE IF NOT TASK TYPE         */ 00264000
*             GENERATE              /* FREE IT FROM SQA (SP245)      */ 00265000
*                 (ICM  R0,8,SQA);                                 0185 00266000
         B     @RC00183                                            0185 00267000
@RF00183 DS    0H                                                  0185 00268000
         ICM  R0,8,SQA                                                  00269000
*           GENERATE                /* NOW FREE THE TQE              */ 00270000
*               (FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1));                         0186 00271000
@RC00183 DS    0H                                                  0186 00272000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00273000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0187 00274000
*            (R0,                                                  0187 00275000
*             TQEPTR) UNRSTD;                                      0187 00276000
*         END;                                                     0188 00277000
*       ELSE                        /* IF NOT A CANCEL               */ 00278000
*         DO;                                                      0189 00279000
         B     @RC00171                                            0189 00280000
@RF00171 DS    0H                                                  0190 00281000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0190 00282000
*            (R11,                                                 0190 00283000
*             R12,                                                 0190 00284000
*             R13,                                                 0190 00285000
*             R14) RSTD;                                           0190 00286000
*           GENERATE;                                              0191 00287000
              SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=DISP,                              CC00288000
               RELATED=('TQE QUEUE',IEAVRT00(NONE))                     00289000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0192 00290000
*            (R11,                                                 0192 00291000
*             R12,                                                 0192 00292000
*             R13,                                                 0192 00293000
*             R14) UNRSTD;                                         0192 00294000
*         END;                                                     0193 00295000
*       ERROR='00'X;                /* INITIALIZE TO NO ERROR        */ 00296000
@RC00171 MVI   ERROR(RBPTR),X'00'                                  0194 00297000
*       IF XSATMTYP='1'B            /* IF REAL/WAIT TYPE TQE,        */ 00298000
*         THEN                      /* MUST CALCULATE INTV LEFT      */ 00299000
         TM    XSATMTYP(RBPTR),B'10000000'                         0195 00300000
         BNO   @RF00195                                            0195 00301000
*         DO;                       /* USING CURRENT TIME.           */ 00302000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0197 00303000
*            (R0,                                                  0197 00304000
*             R1,                                                  0197 00305000
*             R3) RSTD;             /*                       @ZA11878*/ 00306000
*           GENERATE CODE;                                         0198 00307000
               STCK  TIME(RBPTR)          STORE TOD CLOCK               00308000
               BZ    TIMESET1             TIME OK IF CC=0.              00309000
               L     R0,AREASIZE          STCK FAILED. USE TIME SVC     00310000
               GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)          GET STCK AREA FOR TIME SVC    00311000
               LR    R3,R1                SAVE AREA ADDRESS   @ZA11878  00312000
               LR    R0,R1                TIME INTERFACE REGISTER       00313000
               TIME  STCK,(0),ERRET=TTIMENG                             00314000
               MVC   TIME(8,RBPTR),0(R3)                      @ZA11878  00315000
               B     FREEAREA             LEAVE ERROR=0 IF TIME OK      00316000
TTIMENG        MVI   ERROR(RBPTR),X'08'   SET ERROR=8 IF TIME NO GOOD   00317000
FREEAREA       L    R0,AREASIZE                               @ZA11878  00318000
               FREEMAIN  R,LV=(0),A=(3)    FREE STCK AREA     @ZA11878  00319000
TIMESET1       EQU   *                                                  00320000
*           RFY                                                    0199 00321000
*            (R3) UNRSTD;           /*                       @ZA11878*/ 00322000
*           R0=INTVLH;              /* NOW CALCULATE TRUE REAL       */ 00323000
         L     R0,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0200 00324000
*           R1=INTVRH;              /* INTERVAL REMAINING            */ 00325000
         L     R1,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0201 00326000
*           GENERATE CODE;                                         0202 00327000
*                                     /* INTV = INTV - TIME         */  00328000

               BC    11,SUBLEFT1                                        00330000
               BCTR  R0,0                                               00331000
SUBLEFT1       SL    R0,TIMELH(RBPTR)                                   00332000
*           INTVLH=R0;                                             0203 00333000
         ST    R0,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0203 00334000
*           INTVRH=R1;                                             0204 00335000
         ST    R1,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0204 00336000
*         END;                                                     0205 00337000
*       IF ERROR¬='00'X             /* IF INTV LEFT NOT CORRECT      */ 00338000
*         THEN                      /* THEN GIVE ERROR RETURN        */ 00339000
@RF00195 CLI   ERROR(RBPTR),X'00'                                  0206 00340000
         BE    @RF00206                                            0206 00341000
*         RETCODE=8;                /* CODE = 8                      */ 00342000
         LA    RETCODE,8                                           0207 00343000
*       ELSE                        /* HERE IF INTV IS CORRECT       */ 00344000
*         DO;                                                      0208 00345000
         B     @RC00206                                            0208 00346000
@RF00206 DS    0H                                                  0209 00347000
*           IF INTV(1:1)='1'B       /* IF NEGATIVE TIME LEFT,        */ 00348000

         TM    INTV(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0209 00350000
         BNO   @RF00209                                            0209 00351000
*             INTV='0000000000000000'X;                            0210 00352000
         MVC   INTV(8,RBPTR),@CB02935                              0210 00353000
*           IF SAVR(2,31:31)='1'B   /* IF MIC REQUESTED,             */ 00354000
*             THEN                  /* STORE RESULTS IN USER AREA    */ 00355000
@RF00209 TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000010'                           0211 00356000
         BNO   @RF00211                                            0211 00357000
*             DO;                                                  0212 00358000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0213 00359000
*                (KEYREG) RSTD;     /* INDICATE USER AREA STORE      */ 00360000
*               XSAUAREA='1'B;      /*                       @YM02417*/ 00361000
         OI    XSAUAREA(RBPTR),B'00001000'                         0214 00362000
*               DO;                 /* MODESET EXTKEY(RBT234)      0215 00363000
*                                      WORKREG(KEYREG)               */ 00364000
*                 KEYREG=TCBRBP;    /* RB PTR FROM TCB               */ 00365000
         L     KEYREG,TCBRBP(,TCBPTR)                              0216 00366000
*                 KEYREG=KEYREG->RBLINK;/* NEXT RB ADDRESS           */ 00367000
         L     KEYREG,RBLINK(,KEYREG)                              0217 00368000
*                 KEYREG=KEYREG->RBOPSW(2);/* PSW KEY FROM RB OLD PSW*/ 00369000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0218 00370000
         IC    @12,RBOPSW+1(,KEYREG)                               0218 00371000
         LR    KEYREG,@12                                          0218 00372000
*                 SPKA(KEYREG);     /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00373000
         SPKA  0(KEYREG)                                           0219 00374000
*               END;                /* MODESET EXTKEY(RBT234)      0220 00375000
*                                      WORKREG(KEYREG)               */ 00376000
*               AREA=INTV;          /* STORE RESULTS FOR USER        */ 00377000
         L     @12,INPTR(,RBPTR)                                   0221 00378000
         MVC   AREA(8,@12),INTV(RBPTR)                             0221 00379000
*               GENERATE            /* RETURN TO PROTECT KEY ZERO    */ 00380000
*                   (SPKA  0);                                     0222 00381000
         SPKA  0                                                        00382000
*               XSAUAREA='0'B;      /*                       @YM02417*/ 00383000
         NI    XSAUAREA(RBPTR),B'11110111'                         0223 00384000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0224 00385000
*                (KEYREG) UNRSTD;                                  0224 00386000
*             END;                                                 0225 00387000
*           ELSE                    /* IF TO REQUESTED               */ 00388000
*             DO;                   /* CONVERT TO TIMER UNITS        */ 00389000
         B     @RC00211                                            0226 00390000
@RF00211 DS    0H                                                  0227 00391000
*               R0=INTVLH;                                         0227 00392000
         L     R0,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0227 00393000
*               R1=INTVRH;                                         0228 00394000
         L     R1,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0228 00395000
*               GENERATE;                                          0229 00396000
                    SLDL  R0,13                                         00397000
                    D     R0,KTU                                        00398000
                    SLL  R1,1                                           00399000
*               SAVR(1)=R1;         /* PUT TIMER UNIT RESULTS INTO 0230 00400000
*                                      SAVE FOR R0 RESTORE LATER.    */ 00401000
         ST    R1,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                     0230 00402000
*             END;                                                 0231 00403000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0232 00404000
*            (R0,                                                  0232 00405000
*             R1) UNRSTD;                                          0232 00406000
@RC00211 DS    0H                                                  0233 00407000
*           RETCODE=0;                                             0233 00408000
         SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0233 00409000
*         END;                                                     0234 00410000
*     END;                                                         0235 00411000
@RC00206 DS    0H                                                  0236 00412000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0236 00413000
*    (AREAPTR,                                                     0236 00414000
*     INTVPTR,                                                     0236 00415000
*     R11,                                                         0236 00416000
*     R12,                                                         0236 00417000
*     R13,                                                         0236 00418000
*     RETADDR) RSTD;                                               0236 00419000
@RC00150 DS    0H                                                  0237 00420000
*   R13=RETCODE;                    /* SAVE RETCODE ACROSS PGFREE AND   00421000
*                                      ESTAE                         */ 00422000
         LR    R13,RETCODE                                         0237 00423000
*   IF TTSTBASE¬<CVTNUCB THEN       /* IF MODULE NOT IN FLPA @ZA02745*/ 00424000
         C     TTSTBASE,CVTNUCB(,CVTREG)                           0238 00425000
         BL    @RF00238                                            0238 00426000
*     DO;                           /* PAGE FREE THE MODULE  @ZA02745*/ 00427000
*       R11=ADDR(FIXSTART);         /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 00428000
         LA    R11,FIXSTART                                        0240 00429000
*       R12=ADDR(FIXEND);           /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 00430000
         LA    R12,FIXEND                                          0241 00431000
*       GENERATE(PGFREE R,A=(R11),EA=(R12));                       0242 00432000
         PGFREE R,A=(R11),EA=(R12)                                      00433000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA02745*/ 00434000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0244 00435000
@RF00238 DS    0H                                                  0244 00436000
*                                     /* REMOVE ESTAE       @Z40FPYB*/  00437000
    FESTAE 0,WRKREG=(R11)                                               00438000
*   RETCODE=R13;                                                   0245 00439000
         LR    RETCODE,R13                                         0245 00440000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0246 00441000
*    (R13) UNRSTD;                                                 0246 00442000
*   AREAPTR=SAVR(1);                /* RESTOR INPUT PARAMETER        */ 00443000
         L     AREAPTR,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                0247 00444000
*   INTVPTR=SAVR(2);                /* REGISTERS AND RET ADDRESS     */ 00445000
         L     INTVPTR,SAVR+4(,RBPTR)                              0248 00446000
*   RETADDR=SAVR(3);                                               0249 00447000
         L     RETADDR,SAVR+8(,RBPTR)                              0249 00448000
*   IF RETCODE¬=0                   /* IF TTIMER NOT SUCCESSFUL      */ 00449000
*     THEN                          /* CHECK FOR ERRET               */ 00450000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0250 00451000
         BZ    @RF00250                                            0250 00452000
*     DO;                                                          0251 00453000
*       IF SAVR(2,30:30)='0'B THEN  /* IF ERRET NOT SPECIFIED        */ 00454000

         BNZ   @RF00252                                            0252 00456000
*         GENERATE                  /* ABEND USER 22E                */ 00457000
*             (ABEND  X'22E',,,SYSTEM);                            0253 00458000

*     END;                                                         0254 00460000
*   RETURN;                         /* NORMAL RETURN FOR TTIMER      */ 00461000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0255 00462000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0255 00463000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0255 00464000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0256 00465000
*    (AREAPTR,                                                     0256 00466000
*     INTVPTR,                                                     0256 00467000
*     RETADDR) UNRSTD;                                             0256 00468000
*                                                                  0257 00469000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00470000
*/*                                                                  */ 00471000
*/*                         STIMER START                             */ 00472000
*/*                                                                  */ 00473000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00474000
*                                                                  0257 00475000
*IGC0004G:                                                         0257 00476000
*   ENTRY;                          /* E.P. FOR STIMER ROUTINE       */ 00477000
@EP00257 DS    0H                                                  0258 00478000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0258 00479000
*     CVTMAP BASED(CVTREG);                                        0258 00480000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0259 00481000
*    (R3,                                                          0259 00482000
*     INPUTRG,                                                     0259 00483000
*     INTVPTR,                                                     0259 00484000
*     RETADDR,                                                     0259 00485000
*     ASCBPTR) RSTD;                                               0259 00486000
*   SAVR(1)=INPUTRG;                /* SAVE INPUT REGISTERS          */ 00487000
         ST    INPUTRG,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                0260 00488000
*   SAVR(2)=INTVPTR;                /* DO                            */ 00489000
         ST    INTVPTR,SAVR+4(,RBPTR)                              0261 00490000
*   SAVR(3)=RETADDR;                /* DO                    @YM05461*/ 00491000
         ST    RETADDR,SAVR+8(,RBPTR)                              0262 00492000
*   IF SAVR(1,1:3)='000'B           /* IF BINTVL OR TUINTVL  @YM05461*/ 00493000
*     THEN                          /* USER INTERVAL IS ONE WORD   0263 00494000
*                                                            @YM05461*/ 00495000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'11100000'                             0263 00496000
         BNZ   @RF00263                                            0263 00497000
*     INTVLH=USERINTH;              /* SAVE USER SPECIFIED INTERL  0264 00498000
*                                                            @YM05461*/ 00499000
         MVC   INTVLH(4,RBPTR),USERINTH(INTVPTR)                   0264 00500000
*   ELSE                            /* USER INTERVAL DOUBLE WORD   0265 00501000
*                                                            @YM05461*/ 00502000
*     INTV=USERINTV;                /* SAVE USER SPECIFIED INTRVL    */ 00503000
         B     @RC00263                                            0265 00504000
@RF00263 MVC   INTV(8,RBPTR),USERINTV(INTVPTR)                     0265 00505000
*   CVTREG=R3;                      /* SET CVT PTR           @YM06037*/ 00506000

         BNZ   @RF00374                                            0374 00897000
*             R3=253;                                              0375 00898000
         LA    R3,253                                              0375 00899000
*           ELSE                    /* FROM SQA IF REAL/WAIT TYPE    */ 00900000
*             R3=245;                                              0376 00901000
         B     @RC00374                                            0376 00902000
@RF00374 LA    R3,245                                              0376 00903000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0377 00904000
*            (R14) RSTD;            /* GET CORE FOR TQE              */ 00905000
@RC00374 DS    0H                                                  0378 00906000
*           R14=R3;                                                0378 00907000
         LR    R14,R3                                              0378 00908000
*           DO;                     /* GETMAIN (RU) LV(R0) SP(R14) 0379 00909000
*                                      BRANCH                        */ 00910000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0380 00911000
*              (GPR01F,                                            0380 00912000
*               GPR03F,                                            0380 00913000
*               GPR00F) RESTRICTED;                                0380 00914000
*             GPR01F=0;             /* REG 1 MUST BE ZERO            */ 00915000
         SLR   GPR01F,GPR01F                                       0381 00916000
*             GPR03F=2;             /* RU-TYPE GETMAIN               */ 00917000
         LA    GPR03F,2                                            0382 00918000
*             GPR00F=R0;            /* LENGTH REQUESTED              */ 00919000
*             GPR03F=GPR03F|((R14)*256);/* SP IN BYTE 2              */ 00920000
         LR    @12,R14                                             0384 00921000
         SLA   @12,8                                               0384 00922000
         OR    GPR03F,@12                                          0384 00923000
*             CALL CVTCRMN;         /* BRANCH ENTRY POINT            */ 00924000
         L     @15,CVTCRMN(,CVTREG)                                0385 00925000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0385 00926000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0386 00927000
*              (GPR01F,                                            0386 00928000
*               GPR03F,                                            0386 00929000
*               GPR00F) UNRESTRICTED;                              0386 00930000
*           END;                    /* GETMAIN (RU) LV(R0) SP(R14) 0387 00931000
*                                      BRANCH                        */ 00932000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0388 00933000
*            (R0,                                                  0388 00934000
*             R14) UNRSTD;          /* SET UP TQE POINTER NOW BUILD     00935000
*                                      THE BASIC PORTION OF THE TQE     00936000
*                                      IN THE NEW CORE               */ 00937000
*           TQETQE=' TQE';          /* PUT IN CONTROL BLOCK ID       */ 00938000
         MVC   TQETQE(4,TQEPTR),@CC02729                           0389 00939000
*           TQEAID=ASCBASID;        /* SAVE REQUESTORS ASID          */ 00940000
         LH    @14,ASCBASID(,ASCBPTR)                              0390 00941000
         N     @14,@CF03004                                        0390 00942000
         STH   @14,TQEAID(,TQEPTR)                                 0390 00943000
*           TQESADDR=0;             /* NO PP SAVE AREA YET           */ 00944000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0391 00945000
         ST    @14,TQESADDR(,TQEPTR)                               0391 00946000
*           TQETCB=TCBPTR;          /* SAVE REQUESTORS TCB ADDR      */ 00947000
         ST    TCBPTR,TQETCB(,TQEPTR)                              0392 00948000
*           TQEASCB=ASCBPTR;        /* SAVE REQUESTORS ASCB ADDR     */ 00949000
         ST    ASCBPTR,TQEASCB(,TQEPTR)                            0393 00950000
*         END;                      /* NOW BUILD THE COMMON PORTION     00951000
*                                      OF THE TQE                    */ 00952000
*       TQEFLGS='80'X;              /* INITIALIZE FLAGS              */ 00953000
@RF00370 MVI   TQEFLGS(TQEPTR),X'80'                               0395 00954000
*       TQEFLGS2='40'X;             /* INITIALIZE FLAGS              */ 00955000
         MVI   TQEFLGS2(TQEPTR),X'40'                              0396 00956000
*       TQEFLGS3='00'X;             /* INITIALIZE FLAGS      @Z40FPYB*/ 00957000
         MVI   TQEFLGS3(TQEPTR),X'00'                              0397 00958000
*       TQEEXIT=SAVR(1);            /* SAVE USER EXIT ADDRESS        */ 00959000
         L     @14,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                    0398 00960000
         ST    @14,TQEEXIT(,TQEPTR)                                0398 00961000
*       IF SAVR(1,9:32)¬='000000'X  /* IF NO USER EXIT SPECIFIED     */ 00962000
*         THEN                      /* INDICATE THIS IN TQEFLGS      */ 00963000
         CLC   SAVR+1(3,RBPTR),@CB02971                            0399 00964000
         BE    @RF00399                                            0399 00965000
*         TQEXITSP='1'B;                                           0400 00966000
         OI    TQEXITSP(TQEPTR),B'00000100'                        0400 00967000
*       TQELHPSW=RBLINK->RBOPSW(1:4);/* SAVE USER PSW - LEFT HALF    */ 00968000
@RF00399 L     @14,RBLINK(,RBPTR)                                  0401 00969000
         MVC   TQELHPSW(4,TQEPTR),RBOPSW(@14)                      0401 00970000
*       IF SAVR(1,1:4)='0110'B|     /* IF INTV IN BINARY,            */ 00971000
*           SAVR(1,1:4)='0111'B|SAVR(1,1:4)='0011'B|SAVR(1,1:4)='0001'B 00972000
*         THEN                      /* CONVERT TO TOD                */ 00973000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'01100000'                             0402 00974000
         BNO   @GL00017                                            0402 00975000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'10010000'                             0402 00976000
         BZ    @RT00402                                            0402 00977000
@GL00017 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'01110000'                             0402 00978000
         BNO   @GL00016                                            0402 00979000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0402 00980000
         BZ    @RT00402                                            0402 00981000
@GL00016 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'00110000'                             0402 00982000
         BNO   @GL00015                                            0402 00983000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'11000000'                             0402 00984000
         BZ    @RT00402                                            0402 00985000
@GL00015 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'00010000'                             0402 00986000
         BNO   @RF00402                                            0402 00987000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'11100000'                             0402 00988000
         BNZ   @RF00402                                            0402 00989000
@RT00402 DS    0H                                                  0403 00990000
*         DO;                       /* CLOCK UNITS                   */ 00991000
*           R3=INTVLH;                                             0404 00992000
         L     R3,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0404 00993000
*           GENERATE                /* BIN * 10,000 = CLK            */ 00994000
*               (M     R2,K10000);                                 0405 00995000
         M     R2,K10000                                                00996000
*           INTVLH=R2;              /* LEFT HALF OF CLOCK UNITS      */ 00997000
         ST    R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0406 00998000
*           INTVRH=R3;              /* RIGHT HALF OF CLOCK UNITS     */ 00999000
         ST    R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0407 01000000
*         END;                                                     0408 01001000
*       ELSE                        /* IF MICVL, VALUE IS ALREADY    */ 01002000
*         DO;                       /* IN TOD CLOCK UNITS.           */ 01003000
         B     @RC00402                                            0409 01004000
@RF00402 DS    0H                                                  0410 01005000
*           IF SAVR(1,1:4)='0000'B  /* IF TUINTVL SPECIFIED,         */ 01006000
*             THEN                  /* CONVERT TO TOD CLOCK UNITS    */ 01007000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'11110000'                             0410 01008000
         BNZ   @RF00410                                            0410 01009000
*             DO;                                                  0411 01010000
*               XSAHIGH='0'B;       /* INITIALIZE TO TUS<2**31       */ 01011000
         NI    XSAHIGH(RBPTR),B'11011111'                          0412 01012000
*               IF INTV(1:1)='1'B   /* IF TUS TOO HIGH,              */ 01013000
*                 THEN              /* REDUCE SO HO BIT IS ZERO.     */ 01014000
         TM    INTV(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0413 01015000
         BNO   @RF00413                                            0413 01016000
*                 DO;                                              0414 01017000
*                   INTV(1:1)='0'B; /* TURN OFF HO BIT               */ 01018000
         NI    INTV(RBPTR),B'01111111'                             0415 01019000
*                   XSAHIGH='1'B;   /* REMEMBER THIS ACTION          */ 01020000
         OI    XSAHIGH(RBPTR),B'00100000'                          0416 01021000
*                 END;                                             0417 01022000
*               R3=INTVLH;                                         0418 01023000
@RF00413 L     R3,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0418 01024000
*               GENERATE CODE;                                     0419 01025000
                      M     R2,KTU         TU * 26.01466 * CLK          01026000
                      SRDL  R2,14          SHIFT SO BIT 51 = MICROSEC   01027000
*               IF XSAHIGH='1'B     /* IF HO BIT OF TUS WAS ON       */ 01028000
*                 THEN              /* ADD IN ITS VALUE IN US.       */ 01029000
         TM    XSAHIGH(RBPTR),B'00100000'                          0420 01030000
         BNO   @RF00420                                            0420 01031000
*                 DO;                                              0421 01032000
*                   GENERATE CODE;                                 0422 01033000
                            AL   R3,KTURH    ADD IN RH OF MICROSECNDS   01034000
                            BC   12,ADDLEFT1 BRANCH IF NO CARRY         01035000
                            AL   R2,ONE    ADD IN CARRY                 01036000
ADDLEFT1                    A    R2,KTULH    ADD IN LH OF MICROSECNDS   01037000
*                 END;                                             0423 01038000
*               INTVLH=R2;                                         0424 01039000
@RF00420 ST    R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0424 01040000
*               INTVRH=R3;                                         0425 01041000
         ST    R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0425 01042000
*             END;                                                 0426 01043000
*         END;                      /* NOW HAVE INTV=INTERVAL IN   0427 01044000
*                                      MICROSECONDS- BIT 51= 1 US    */ 01045000
@RF00410 DS    0H                                                  0428 01046000
*       IF SAVR(1,1:4)='0110'B|     /* IF SPECIFIC TIME OF DAY,      */ 01047000
*           SAVR(1,1:4)='0111'B THEN/* CHANGE TO CORRECT TODC VAL    */ 01048000
@RC00402 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'01100000'                             0428 01049000
         BNO   @GL00018                                            0428 01050000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'10010000'                             0428 01051000
         BZ    @RT00428                                            0428 01052000
@GL00018 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'01110000'                             0428 01053000
         BNO   @RF00428                                            0428 01054000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0428 01055000
         BNZ   @RF00428                                            0428 01056000
@RT00428 DS    0H                                                  0429 01057000
*         DO;                                                      0429 01058000
*           IF SAVR(1,1:4)='0111'B  /* IF LOCAL TOD SPECIFIED,       */ 01059000
*             THEN                  /* INITALIZE TZ TO 0 AND         */ 01060000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'01110000'                             0430 01061000
         BNO   @RF00430                                            0430 01062000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0430 01063000
         BNZ   @RF00430                                            0430 01064000
*             DO;                                                  0431 01065000
*               TQETOD='1'B;        /* PUT TOD BIT ON IN TQE         */ 01066000
         OI    TQETOD(TQEPTR),B'01000000'                          0432 01067000
*               TZ=0;                                              0433 01068000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0433 01069000
         ST    @14,TZ(,RBPTR)                                      0433 01070000
*             END;                                                 0434 01071000
*           ELSE                    /* IF GMT SPECIFIED, MUST        */ 01072000
*             TZ=CVTTZ;             /* USE TIME ZONE IN CALCS        */ 01073000
         B     @RC00430                                            0435 01074000
@RF00430 L     @14,CVTTZ(,CVTREG)                                  0435 01075000
         ST    @14,TZ(,RBPTR)                                      0435 01076000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0436 01077000
*            (TPCPTR) RSTD;                                        0436 01078000
@RC00430 DS    0H                                                  0437 01079000
*           TPCPTR=CVTTPC;                                         0437 01080000
         L     TPCPTR,CVTTPC(,CVTREG)                              0437 01081000
*           R2=MNIGHTLH;            /* NOW, SUBTRACT 1 DAY IN        */ 01082000
         L     R2,MNIGHTLH(,TPCPTR)                                0438 01083000
*           R3=MNIGHTRH;            /* MICROSECS FROM MNIGHT AND     */ 01084000
         L     R3,MNIGHTRH(,TPCPTR)                                0439 01085000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0440 01086000
*            (TPCPTR) UNRSTD;                                      0440 01087000
*           GENERATE CODE;                                         0441 01088000
*                                     /* ADD TO IT INTV PLUS TZ.    */  01089000
                SL     R3,DAYRH                                         01090000
                BC     11,SUBLEFT2                                      01091000
                BCTR   R2,0                                             01092000
SUBLEFT2        SL     R2,DAYLH       R2,R3= MNIGHT-86.4 *(10**9)=X     01093000
                AL     R3,INTVRH(RBPTR)                                 01094000
                BC     12,ADDLEFT2                                      01095000
                AL     R2,ONE                                           01096000
ADDLEFT2        AL     R2,INTVLH(RBPTR)     R2,R3=X+INTV                01097000
                AL     R2,TZ(RBPTR)         ADD IN TIMAE ZONE          01098000
*           INTVLH=R2;              /* SAVE CLOCK COMP VALUE         */ 01099000
         ST    R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0442 01100000
*           INTVRH=R3;                                             0443 01101000
         ST    R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0443 01102000
*           IF INTVLH<TIMELH|(INTVLH=TIMELH&(INTVRH¬>TIMERH))/* IF 0444 01103000
*                                      CLK COMP VALUE LESS THAN OR 0444 01104000
*                                      EQUAL TO CURRENT TODC         */ 01105000
*             THEN                  /* ADD IN 24 HOURS OF US         */ 01106000
         L     @14,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                  0444 01107000
         L     @12,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                  0444 01108000
         CLR   @14,@12                                             0444 01109000
         BL    @RT00444                                            0444 01110000
         CLR   @14,@12                                             0444 01111000
         BNE   @RF00444                                            0444 01112000

         CL    @14,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                  0444 01114000

@RT00444 DS    0H                                                  0445 01116000
*             DO;                                                  0445 01117000
*               R2=INTVLH;                                         0446 01118000
         L     R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0446 01119000
*               R3=INTVRH;                                         0447 01120000
         L     R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0447 01121000
*               GENERATE;                                          0448 01122000
                      AL   R3,DAYRH                                     01123000
                      BC   12,ADDLEFT3                                  01124000
                      AL   R2,ONE                                       01125000
ADDLEFT3              AL   R2,DAYLH                                     01126000
*               INTVLH=R2;                                         0449 01127000
         ST    R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0449 01128000
*               INTVRH=R3;                                         0450 01129000
         ST    R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0450 01130000
*             END;                                                 0451 01131000
*         END;                                                     0452 01132000
*       ELSE                        /* IS GMT OR TOD NOT SPCFIED     */ 01133000
*         DO;                       /* ENSURE INTERVAL ¬> 24 HRS     */ 01134000
         B     @RC00428                                            0453 01135000
@RF00428 DS    0H                                                  0454 01136000
*           IF INTVLH>DAYLH|(INTVLH=DAYLH&INTVRH>DAYRH)/* IF GRTR,   */ 01137000
*             THEN                  /* SET IT TO 24 HOURS            */ 01138000
         L     @14,DAYLH                                           0454 01139000
         L     @12,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                  0454 01140000
         CLR   @12,@14                                             0454 01141000
         BH    @RT00454                                            0454 01142000
         CLR   @12,@14                                             0454 01143000
         BNE   @RF00454                                            0454 01144000
         CLC   INTVRH(4,RBPTR),DAYRH                               0454 01145000
         BNH   @RF00454                                            0454 01146000
@RT00454 DS    0H                                                  0455 01147000
*             DO;                                                  0455 01148000
*               INTVLH=DAYLH;                                      0456 01149000
         L     @14,DAYLH                                           0456 01150000
         ST    @14,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                  0456 01151000
*               INTVRH=DAYRH;                                      0457 01152000
         L     @14,DAYRH                                           0457 01153000
         ST    @14,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                  0457 01154000
*             END;                                                 0458 01155000
*           IF SAVR(1,7:8)¬='00'B   /* IF REAL/WAIT TYPE,            */ 01156000
*             THEN                  /* CLR COMP VAL IS INTV+TIME.    */ 01157000
@RF00454 TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'00000011'                             0459 01158000
         BZ    @RF00459                                            0459 01159000
*             DO;                                                  0460 01160000
*               R2=INTVLH;                                         0461 01161000
         L     R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0461 01162000
*               R3=INTVRH;                                         0462 01163000
         L     R3,INTVRH(,RBPTR)                                   0462 01164000
*               GENERATE;                                          0463 01165000

                    BC   12,ADDLEFT4                                    01167000
                    AL   R2,ONE                                         01168000

*               INTVLH=R2;                                         0464 01170000
         ST    R2,INTVLH(,RBPTR)                                   0464 01171000
*               INTVRH=R3;                                         0465 01172000

*             END;                                                 0466 01174000
*         END;                                                     0467 01175000
@RF00459 DS    0H                                                  0468 01176000

*        (R2,                                                      0468 01178000
*         R3) UNRSTD;                                              0468 01179000

*       TQEVAL=INTV;                /* PUT INTERVAL INTO NEW TQE     */ 01181000
         MVC   TQEVAL(8,TQEPTR),INTV(RBPTR)                        0469 01182000
*       IF SAVR(1,7:8)¬='00'B       /* IF REAL OR WAIT TYPE,         */ 01183000
*         THEN                      /* SET TQETYPE ACCORINGLY.       */ 01184000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'00000011'                             0470 01185000
         BZ    @RF00470                                            0470 01186000
*         IF SAVR(1,7:8)='01'B      /* IF WAIT TYPE ,                */ 01187000
*           THEN                    /* SET TQETYPE ACCORDINGLY       */ 01188000

         OI    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000001'                         0473 01196000
*             TQEECB=0;             /* CLEAR ECB.                    */ 01197000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0474 01198000

*           END;                                                   0475 01200000

*           TQETYPE='11'B;          /* SET TQETYPE                   */ 01202000
         B     @RC00471                                            0476 01203000
@RF00471 OI    TQETYPE(TQEPTR),B'00000011'                         0476 01204000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0477 01205000
*        (R11,                                                     0477 01206000
*         R12,                                                     0477 01207000
*         R13,                                                     0477 01208000
*         R14) RSTD;                                               0477 01209000
@RC00471 DS    0H                                                  0477 01210000
@RF00470 DS    0H                                                  0478 01211000
*       GENERATE;                                                  0478 01212000
*                                     /* GET THE DISPATCHER LOCK    */  01213000

               RELATED=('TQE QUEUE',IEAVRT00(NONE))                     01215000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0479 01216000
*        (R11,                                                     0479 01217000
*         R12,                                                     0479 01218000
*         R13,                                                     0479 01219000
*         R14) UNRSTD;                                             0479 01220000
*       RETCODE=0;                  /* INITIALIZE TO NO ERROR        */ 01221000
         SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0480 01222000
*       IF SAVR(1,7:8)='00'B        /* IF TASK TYPE REQUEST,         */ 01223000
*         THEN                      /* CHECK FOR GOOD CPU TIMER.     */ 01224000
*                                                                  0481 01225000
         TM    SAVR(RBPTR),B'00000011'                             0481 01226000
         BNZ   @RF00481                                            0481 01227000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01228000
*         /*                                                         */ 01229000
*         /* TEST FOR TASK TO CPU AFFINITY. NO AFFINITY IS INDICATED */ 01230000
*         /* BY A MASK OF ALL 0'S OR ALL F'S.                        */ 01231000
*         /*                                                         */ 01232000
*         /***********************************************************/ 01233000
*                                                                  0482 01234000
*         DO;                                                      0482 01235000
*           IF TCBAFFN¬='0000'X&TCBAFFN¬='FFFF'X/*           @ZA13903*/ 01236000
*             THEN                  /* THIS CPU MUST HAVE A GOOD     */ 01237000
         CLC   TCBAFFN(2,TCBPTR),@CB02722                          0483 01238000
         BE    @RF00483                                            0483 01239000
         CLC   TCBAFFN(2,TCBPTR),@CB02974                          0483 01240000
         BE    @RF00483                                            0483 01241000
*             DO;                   /* CPU TIMER.                    */ 01242000
*               IF PCCANUIN='1'B    /* IF CPU'S CPU TIMER NO GOOD    */ 01243000
*                 THEN              /* INDICATE WITH RETCODE 8.      */ 01244000
         L     @14,PCCAPTR                                         0485 01245000
         TM    PCCANUIN(@14),B'10000000'                           0485 01246000
         BNO   @RF00485                                            0485 01247000
*                 RETCODE=8;                                       0486 01248000
         LA    RETCODE,8                                           0486 01249000
*             END;                                                 0487 01250000
*           ELSE                    /* IF NO CPU AFFINITY THEN       */ 01251000
*             IF CSDGDINT=0         /* IF NO GOOD CPU TMR IN SYS,    */ 01252000
*               THEN                /* INDICATE WITH RETCODE 8.      */ 01253000
         B     @RC00483                                            0488 01254000
@RF00483 L     @14,CVTCSD(,CVTREG)                                 0488 01255000
         L     @14,CSDGDINT(,@14)                                  0488 01256000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0488 01257000
         BNZ   @RF00488                                            0488 01258000
*               RETCODE=8;                                         0489 01259000
         LA    RETCODE,8                                           0489 01260000
*         END;                                                     0490 01261000
*       ELSE                        /* IF REAL OR WAIT THEN          */ 01262000
*         IF CSDGDCC=0              /* IF NO GOOD CLK CMP IN SYS,    */ 01263000
*           THEN                    /* INDICATE WITH RETCODE=8.      */ 01264000
         B     @RC00481                                            0491 01265000
@RF00481 L     @14,CVTCSD(,CVTREG)                                 0491 01266000
         L     @14,CSDGDCC(,@14)                                   0491 01267000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0491 01268000
         BNZ   @RF00491                                            0491 01269000
*           RETCODE=8;                                             0492 01270000
         LA    RETCODE,8                                           0492 01271000
*       IF RETCODE=0                /* IF NO ERROR,                  */ 01272000
*         THEN                      /* PROCEED WITH STIMER RQST      */ 01273000
@RF00491 DS    0H                                                  0493 01274000

*                (R3) RSTD;                                        0521 01364000

*               R3=TIMERH;                                         0523 01367000

*               GENERATE REFS(HALFSEC);                            0524 01369000

                      BC   12,ADDLEFT5                                  01371000
                      AL   R2,ONE                                       01372000

*               TIMELH=R2;                                         0525 01374000
         ST    R2,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0525 01375000
*               TIMERH=R3;                                         0526 01376000

*               RESPECIFY                                          0527 01378000
*                (R3) RSTD;                                        0527 01379000
*               IF TQEVALLH>TIMELH| /* IF INTV>HALF SECND            */ 01380000
*                   (TQEVALLH=TIMELH&(TQEVALRH>TIMERH)) THEN/* GO  0528 01381000

*               CALL WAITBR;        /* GO INTO WAIT                  */ 01402000

*WAITRET:                                                          0534 01406000

*                                      SP(R14) BRANCH                */ 01459000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0551 01460000
*              (GPR01F,                                            0551 01461000

*               GPR00F) RESTRICTED;                                0551 01463000

         BL    @RF00564                                            0564 01501000

*               R11=ADDR(FIXSTART); /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 01503000

*               R12=ADDR(FIXEND);   /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 01505000
         LA    R12,FIXEND                                          0567 01506000

*             END;                  /*                       @ZA02745*/ 01509000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0570 01510000
*            (R11,                                                 0570 01511000
*             R12,                                                 0570 01512000
*             R13,                                                 0570 01513000
*             R14) UNRSTD;                                         0570 01514000
@RF00564 DS    0H                                                  0571 01515000
*           RETCODE=8;              /* INDICATE ERROR                */ 01516000
         LA    RETCODE,8                                           0571 01517000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0572 01518000
*            (TQEPTR) UNRSTD;                                      0572 01519000
*         END;                                                     0573 01520000
*     END;                                                         0574 01521000
@RC00493 DS    0H                                                  0575 01522000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0575 01523000
*    (ASCBPTR) UNRSTD;                                             0575 01524000
@RF00299 DS    0H                                                  0576 01525000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0576 01526000
*    (INPUTRG,                                                     0576 01527000
*     INTVPTR,                                                     0576 01528000
*     RETADDR) RSTD;                /*                       @YM06037*/ 01529000
*   INPUTRG=SAVR(1);                /* RESTORE INPUT REGS            */ 01530000
         L     INPUTRG,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                0577 01531000
*   INTVPTR=SAVR(2);                /* DO                            */ 01532000
         L     INTVPTR,SAVR+4(,RBPTR)                              0578 01533000
*   RETADDR=SAVR(3);                /* DO                            */ 01534000
         L     RETADDR,SAVR+8(,RBPTR)                              0579 01535000
*   IF RETCODE¬=0                   /* IF THERE WAS AN ERROR,        */ 01536000
*     THEN                          /* ABEND USER OR GO TO ERRET.    */ 01537000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0580 01538000
         BZ    @RF00580                                            0580 01539000
*     DO;                                                          0581 01540000
*       IF RETCODE=4                /* IF RETCODE=4                  */ 01541000
*         THEN                      /* ABEND USER 12F.               */ 01542000

*         GENERATE(ABEND  X'12F',,,SYSTEM);                        0583 01545000
         ABEND  X'12F',,,SYSTEM                                         01546000

*         IF SAVR(1,5:5)='0'B       /* IF RETCODE=8 & NO ERRET       */ 01548000
*           THEN                    /* ABEND USER 22F.               */ 01549000
         B     @RC00582                                            0584 01550000
