*           GENERATE(ABEND  X'22F',,,SYSTEM);                      0585 01553000
         ABEND  X'22F',,,SYSTEM                                         01554000
*     END;                                                         0586 01555000
*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01556000
         B     @EL00001                                            0587 01557000
*                                                                  0588 01558000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 01559000
*/*                                                                  */ 01560000
*/*                    TTIMER/STIMER ESTAE ROUTINE                   */ 01561000
*/*                                                                  */ 01562000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 01563000
*/*                                                                  */ 01564000
*/*        FUNCTION  - RECORDS IN SDWA ANY ERRORS OCCURRING IN       */ 01565000
*/*                    TTIMER.  ADDITIONALLY,                        */ 01566000
*/*                    IF MIC OR STCK ARE SPECIFIED,  TTIMER STORES  */ 01567000
*/*                    INTO A USER SUPPLIED DATA AREA.  WHEN DOING   */ 01568000
*/*                    THIS, TTIMER ASSUMES THE USER'S PROTECT KEY.  */ 01569000
*/*                    IF AN 0C4 OR 0C5 PROGRAM CHECK ENSUES,        */ 01570000
*/*                    THIS ROUTINE WILL CONVERT IT TO A 12E ABEND   */ 01571000
*/*                                                                  */ 01572000
*/*        INPUT     - 1. R0¬=12 IF AN SDWA PRESENT                  */ 01573000
*/*                    2. R1= POINTER TO THE SDWA IF PRESENT         */ 01574000
*/*                    3. R13= POINTER TO 72 BYTE SAVE AREA          */ 01575000
*/*                    4. R14= RETURN ADDRESS                        */ 01576000
*/*                                                                  */ 01577000
*/*        ENVIRONMENT                                               */ 01578000
*/*        CHANGES   - NONE                                          */ 01579000
*/*                                                                  */ 01580000
*/*        OTHER RTNS                                                */ 01581000
*/*        USED      - SETRP                                         */ 01582000
*/*                                                                  */ 01583000
*/*        CALLERS   - RTM                                           */ 01584000
*/*                                                                  */ 01585000
*/*        OUTPUT    - IF ENTRY DUE TO A 0C4 OR 0C5 PROGRAM CHECK,   */ 01586000
*/*                    WHILE BIT XSAUAREA IS ONE, THE PROGRAM        */ 01587000
*/*                    CHECK IS CONVERTED TO A 12E ABEND.            */ 01588000
*/*                                                                  */ 01589000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 01590000
*                                                                  0588 01591000
*TTSTSTAE:                          /* ENTRY POINT TO ESTAE RTN      */ 01592000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0588 01593000
*     RBSECT BASED(SDWAPARM);                                      0588 01594000
TTSTSTAE DS    0H                                                  0589 01595000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0589 01596000
*    (R0,                                                          0589 01597000
*     SDWAPTR,                                                     0589 01598000
*     R13,                                                         0589 01599000
*     BASEREG) RSTD;                                               0589 01600000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0590 01601000
       SR    R15,R15                  CLEAR R15 FOR R0=12 CASE.         01602000
       LA    R11,12                   CANNOT DO ANYTHING IF R0=12.      01603000
       CR    R11,R0                   IF R0=12, RETURN IMMEDIATELY      01604000
       BE    0(R14)                   WITH ZERO IN R15.                 01605000
       STM   14,12,12(R13)            OTHERWISE, SAVE OTHER REGISTERS   01606000
       BALR  BASEREG,0                ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY          01607000
       USING *,BASEREG                                                  01608000
*   SDWAMODN='IGC0004F';            /* PUT MODULE NAME INTO SDWA     */ 01609000
         MVC   SDWAMODN(8,SDWAPTR),@CC02982                        0591 01610000
*   SDWACSCT='IGC0004F';            /* PUT CSECT NAME INTO SDWA      */ 01611000
         MVC   SDWACSCT(8,SDWAPTR),@CC02982                        0592 01612000
*   SDWAREXN='TTSTSTAE';            /* PUT RECOV RTN NAME IN SDWA  0593 01613000
*                                                            @YM05461*/ 01614000
         MVC   SDWAREXN(8,SDWAPTR),@CC02983                        0593 01615000
*   RBPTR=SDWAGR05;                 /* SET UP SVRB ADDRESSABILITY    */ 01616000
         L     RBPTR,SDWAGR05(,SDWAPTR)                            0594 01617000
*   IF SDWAFMID=0&                  /* IF THE RIGHT MEMORY AND       */ 01618000
*       SDWAPCHK='1'B&              /* ENTRY DUE TO A PROG CK        */ 01619000
*       (SDWAICD1=4|                /* 0C4 OR                        */ 01620000
*       SDWAICD1=5)&                /* 0C5 AND                       */ 01621000
*       XSAUAREA='1'B               /* WERE STORING INTO USER AREA   */ 01622000
*     THEN                          /* ABEND USER 12E                */ 01623000
         LH    @03,SDWAFMID(,SDWAPTR)                              0595 01624000
         N     @03,@CF03004                                        0595 01625000
         LTR   @03,@03                                             0595 01626000
         BNZ   @RF00595                                            0595 01627000
         TM    SDWAPCHK(SDWAPTR),B'01000000'                       0595 01628000
         BNO   @RF00595                                            0595 01629000
         CLI   SDWAICD1(SDWAPTR),4                                 0595 01630000
         BE    @GL00026                                            0595 01631000
         CLI   SDWAICD1(SDWAPTR),5                                 0595 01632000
         BNE   @RF00595                                            0595 01633000
@GL00026 TM    XSAUAREA(RBPTR),B'00001000'                         0595 01634000
         BNO   @RF00595                                            0595 01635000
*     DO;                                                          0596 01636000
*       DO;                         /* SETRP RECORD(NO)WKAREA(SDWAPTR   01637000
*                                      )RC(0)COMPCOD(302,SYSTEM)DUMP(   01638000
*                                      YES)                          */ 01639000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0598 01640000
*          (GPR00P,                                                0598 01641000
*           GPR01P,                                                0598 01642000
*           GPR14P,                                                0598 01643000
*           GPR15P) RSTD;                                          0598 01644000
*         GPR01P=SDWAPTR;                                          0599 01645000
*         GPR01P->SDWARCDE=0;       /* SAVE RC VALUE                 */ 01646000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'00'                              0600 01647000
*         GPR01P->SDWARCRD='0'B;    /* TURN OFF RECORD INDICATOR     */ 01648000
         NI    SDWARCRD(GPR01P),B'01111111'                        0601 01649000
*         GPR01P->SDWAREQ='1'B;     /* TURN ON DUMP INDICATOR        */ 01650000
         OI    SDWAREQ(GPR01P),B'10000000'                         0602 01651000
*         GPR14P=302;               /* ACCESS COMPLETION CODE        */ 01652000
         LA    GPR14P,302                                          0603 01653000
*         GEN(SLL    14,12);        /* SHIFT TO SYSTEM COMPLETION  0604 01654000
*                                      CODE                          */ 01655000
         SLL    14,12                                                   01656000
*         GPR01P->SDWACMPC=GPR14P;  /* STORE COMPLETION CODE         */ 01657000
         STCM  GPR14P,7,SDWACMPC(GPR01P)                           0605 01658000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0606 01659000
*          (GPR00P,                                                0606 01660000
*           GPR01P,                                                0606 01661000
*           GPR14P,                                                0606 01662000
*           GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                        0606 01663000
*       END;                                                       0607 01664000
*     END;                          /* HERE IF NOT 12E ABEND         */ 01665000
*   ELSE                                                           0609 01666000
*     DO;                           /* SETRP RECORD(YES)WKAREA(SDWAPT   01667000
*                                      R)RC(0)                       */ 01668000
         B     @RC00595                                            0609 01669000
@RF00595 DS    0H                                                  0610 01670000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0610 01671000
*        (GPR00P,                                                  0610 01672000
*         GPR01P,                                                  0610 01673000

@MAINENT BALR  @15,0                                               0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000

@PROLOG  BALR  @09,0                                               0001 00010000

*   SAVR(1)=AREAPTR;                /* SAVE INPUT REGISTERS          */ 00020000

*     CODERG,                                                      0075 00028000
*     RETADDR) UNRSTD;                                             0075 00029000
*   XSAFLGS=0;                      /* INITIALIZE BIT FLAGS          */ 00030000

*   RETCODE=0;                      /* INITIALIZE TO NO ERROR        */ 00032000
         SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0077 00033000
*   CCODE='00'X;                    /* INITIALIZE STCK COND CODE     */ 00034000

*   IF MNIGHTLH='00000000'X&        /* IF NOT YET INITIALIZED        */ 00036000
*       MNIGHTRH='00000000'X THEN                                  0079 00037000

*       DATE=15;                    /* DATE = 0 DECIMAL      @ZA11878*/ 00054000
         MVC   DATE(4,RBPTR),@CF00063                              0085 00055000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA11878*/ 00056000
*   ELSE                            /* HERE IF INITIALIZED           */ 00057000
*     DO;                           /*                       @ZA11878*/ 00058000
         B     @RC00079                                            0087 00059000
@RF00079 DS    0H                                                  0088 00060000
*       DATE='FFFFFFFF'X;           /* FORCE DO LOOP         @ZA11878*/ 00061000
         MVC   DATE(4,RBPTR),@CB02049                              0088 00062000
*       DO WHILE CCODE=0&           /* DO UNTIL ALL VALUES GOTTEN    */ 00063000
*             (DATE¬=CVTDATE|       /* OK OR UNTIL CAN'T GET TODC    */ 00064000
*             TIME(1:1)='1'B|TIMELH>DAYLH|(TIMELH=DAYLH&TIMERH>DAYRH)); 00065000

@DL00089 DS    0H                                                  0090 00067000
*         GENERATE CODE;                                           0090 00068000
*                                     /* STORE TODC AND COND CODE   */  00069000
            STCK STCKAREA(RBPTR)                                        00070000
            BZ   CCTEST                                                 00071000
            MVI  CCODE(RBPTR),X'01'                                     00072000
CCTEST      EQU  *                                                      00073000
*         IF CCODE¬=0               /* IF STORE CLOCK FAILED         */ 00074000
*           THEN                    /* USE ANOTHER CPU'S TOD CLK     */ 00075000
         CLI   CCODE(RBPTR),0                                      0091 00076000

*               IF TIME(1:1)='1'B|  /* IF TIME IS LESS               */ 00273000

*                 DO;                                              0147 00289000

*                   GENERATE        /* CONV DATE TO BIN              */ 00299000
*                       (CVB YEAR,STCKAREA(RBPTR));                0151 00300000
         CVB YEAR,STCKAREA(RBPTR)                                       00301000
*                   DAY=YEAR//1000; /* GET DDD PORTION               */ 00302000

         DR    @00,@14                                             0152 00306000
         LR    DAY,@00                                             0152 00307000
*                   YEAR=YEAR/1000; /* GET YEAR PORTION              */ 00308000
         LR    @00,YEAR                                            0153 00309000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              0153 00310000
         DR    @00,@14                                             0153 00311000
         LR    YEAR,@01                                            0153 00312000
*                   IF TIME(1:1)='1'B/* IF GMT LT ZERO               */ 00313000
*                     THEN          /* ADD A DAY TO TIME AND TAKE  0154 00314000
*                                      FROM DDD                      */ 00315000
         TM    TIME(RBPTR),B'10000000'                             0154 00316000
         BNO   @RF00154                                            0154 00317000
*                     DO;                                          0155 00318000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0156 00319000
*                        (R6,                                      0156 00320000
*                         R7) RSTD;                                0156 00321000
*                       R6=TIMELH;                                 0157 00322000
         L     R6,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0157 00323000
*                       R7=TIMERH;                                 0158 00324000
         L     R7,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                   0158 00325000
*                       GENERATE    /* TIME=TIME+24 HRS              */ 00326000
*                           REFS(DAYLH,DAYRH);                     0159 00327000
                               AL   R7,DAYRH                            00328000
                               BC   12,ADDLEFT2                         00329000
                               AL   R6,ONE                              00330000
ADDLEFT2                       AL   R6,DAYLH                            00331000
*                       TIMELH=R6;                                 0160 00332000
         ST    R6,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0160 00333000
*                       TIMERH=R7;                                 0161 00334000
         ST    R7,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                   0161 00335000
*                       IF DAY¬=1   /* IF NOT JANUARY 1              */ 00336000
*                         THEN      /* SUBTRACT OUT DAY              */ 00337000
         C     DAY,@CF00067                                        0162 00338000
         BE    @RF00162                                            0162 00339000
*                         DAY=DAY-1;                               0163 00340000
         BCTR  DAY,0                                               0163 00341000
*                       ELSE        /* IF JANUARY 1                  */ 00342000
*                         DO;       /* GO BACK TO LAST               */ 00343000
         B     @RC00162                                            0164 00344000
@RF00162 DS    0H                                                  0165 00345000
*                           YEAR=YEAR-1;/* DAY OF LAST YEAR          */ 00346000
         BCTR  YEAR,0                                              0165 00347000
*                           WORKRH=YEAR;                           0166 00348000
         ST    YEAR,WORKRH(,RBPTR)                                 0166 00349000
*                           IF STCKAREA(63:64)/* IF LEAP YEAR        */ 00350000
*                               ='00'B THEN/* RESET DDD TO 366       */ 00351000
         TM    STCKAREA+7(RBPTR),B'00000011'                       0167 00352000
         BNZ   @RF00167                                            0167 00353000
*                             DAY=366;                             0168 00354000
         LA    DAY,366                                             0168 00355000
*                           ELSE    /* IF NOT LEAP YEAR              */ 00356000
*                             DAY=365;/* RESET TO DAY 365            */ 00357000
         B     @RC00167                                            0169 00358000
@RF00167 LA    DAY,365                                             0169 00359000
*                         END;                                     0170 00360000
*                     END;                                         0171 00361000
*                   ELSE            /* IF GMT GT 24 HRS              */ 00362000
*                     DO;           /* SUB A DAY FROM TIME AND ADD IT   00363000
*                                      TO DDD                        */ 00364000
         B     @RC00154                                            0172 00365000
@RF00154 DS    0H                                                  0173 00366000
*                       R6=TIMELH;                                 0173 00367000
         L     R6,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0173 00368000
*                       R7=TIMERH;                                 0174 00369000
         L     R7,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                   0174 00370000
*                       GENERATE    /* TIME=TIME-24 HRS              */ 00371000
*                           REFS(DAYLH,DAYRH);                     0175 00372000
                               SL   R7,DAYRH                            00373000
                               BC   11,SUBLEFT2                         00374000
                               BCTR R6,0                                00375000
SUBLEFT2                       SL   R6,DAYLH                            00376000
*                       TIMELH=R6;                                 0176 00377000
         ST    R6,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0176 00378000
*                       TIMERH=R7;                                 0177 00379000
         ST    R7,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                   0177 00380000
*                       IF DAY<365  /* IF NOT YEAR END,              */ 00381000
*                         THEN      /* ADD IN A DAY.                 */ 00382000
         C     DAY,@CF02060                                        0178 00383000
         BNL   @RF00178                                            0178 00384000
*                         DAY=DAY+1;                               0179 00385000
         AL    DAY,@CF00067                                        0179 00386000
*                       ELSE        /* DAY= 365 OR 366               */ 00387000
*                         DO;                                      0180 00388000
         B     @RC00178                                            0180 00389000
@RF00178 DS    0H                                                  0181 00390000
*                           WORKRH=YEAR;                           0181 00391000
         ST    YEAR,WORKRH(,RBPTR)                                 0181 00392000
*                           IF STCKAREA(63:64)/* IF LEAPYEAR         */ 00393000
*                               ='00'B&/* AND DAY IS                 */ 00394000
*                               DAY=365/* 365                        */ 00395000
*                             THEN  /* NOT YEAR END                  */ 00396000
         TM    STCKAREA+7(RBPTR),B'00000011'                       0182 00397000
         BNZ   @RF00182                                            0182 00398000
         C     DAY,@CF02060                                        0182 00399000
         BNE   @RF00182                                            0182 00400000
*                             DAY=DAY+1;/* ADD 1 TO DDD              */ 00401000
         AL    DAY,@CF00067                                        0183 00402000
*                           ELSE    /* HERE IF ITS                   */ 00403000
*                             DO;   /* YEAR END                      */ 00404000
         B     @RC00182                                            0184 00405000
@RF00182 DS    0H                                                  0185 00406000
*                               YEAR=YEAR+1;/* ADD 1 TO YY           */ 00407000
         LA    @14,1                                               0185 00408000
         ALR   YEAR,@14                                            0185 00409000
*                               DAY=1;/* SET DDD TO 1                */ 00410000
         LR    DAY,@14                                             0186 00411000
*                             END;                                 0187 00412000
*                         END;                                     0188 00413000
@RC00182 DS    0H                                                  0189 00414000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0189 00415000
*                        (R6,                                      0189 00416000
*                         R7) UNRSTD;                              0189 00417000
@RC00178 DS    0H                                                  0190 00418000
*                     END;                                         0190 00419000
*                   YEAR=(YEAR*1000)+DAY;/* NOW, CONVERT NEW VALUE 0191 00420000
*                                      BACK TO                       */ 00421000
@RC00154 LR    @14,YEAR                                            0191 00422000
         MH    @14,@CH02057                                        0191 00423000
         ALR   @14,DAY                                             0191 00424000
         LR    YEAR,@14                                            0191 00425000
*                   GENERATE        /* CVTDATE FORMAT                */ 00426000
*                       (CVD YEAR,STCKAREA(RBPTR));                0192 00427000
         CVD YEAR,STCKAREA(RBPTR)                                       00428000
*                   DATE=WORKRH;    /* 00YYDDD PKD DEC               */ 00429000

*                   RESPECIFY                                      0194 00432000
*                    (DAY,                                         0194 00433000
*                     YEAR) UNRSTD;                                0194 00434000
*                 END;                                             0195 00435000
*             END;                                                 0196 00436000
@RF00146 DS    0H                                                  0197 00437000
*           IF SAVR(2,29:32)='3'X   /* IF MIC REQUEST                */ 00438000
*             THEN                  /* STORE TIME INTO AREA          */ 00439000
@RF00143 TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000011'                           0197 00440000
         BNO   @RF00197                                            0197 00441000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00001100'                           0197 00442000
         BNZ   @RF00197                                            0197 00443000
*             DO;                                                  0198 00444000
*               IF RBLINK->PROTKEY/16>7 THEN/* IF CALLER HAS PROBLEM    00445000
*                                      PROGRAM PROTECT KEY   @Z30KPYA*/ 00446000
         L     @14,RBLINK(,RBPTR)                                  0199 00447000

*                 DO;               /* VALIDITY CK RETURN AREA FOR 0200 00453000
*                                      STORAGE KEY           @Z30KPYA*/ 00454000
*                   RFY                                            0201 00455000
*                    (R1,                                          0201 00456000
*                     R2,                                          0201 00457000
*                     R11,                                         0201 00458000
*                     R12,                                         0201 00459000
*                     R13,                                         0201 00460000
*                     R14) RSTD;    /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00461000

*                                       /*GET LOCAL LOCK @Z30KPYA*/     00463000
         SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=LOCAL,MODE=UNCOND,               @Z30KPYA**00464000
               RELATED=('VALIDITY CK INTF',(IEAVRT01,(NONE))) @Z30KPYA  00465000
*                   R1=ADDR(AREA);  /* @ FIRST WORD TO CK    @Z30KPYA*/ 00466000

*                   R2=ADDR(AREA)+K4;/* @ ENDING WORD TO CK  @Z30KPYA*/ 00469000
         AL    @10,@CF00044                                        0204 00470000

*                   CALL VALIDCHK;  /* BR TO VALIDITY CHK ROUTINE  0205 00472000
*                                                            @Z30KPYA*/ 00473000
         L     @15,CVT0VL00(,CVTREG)                               0205 00474000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0205 00475000
*                   GEN CODE SETS(R14,CCODE) REFS(RBPTR);          0206 00476000
*                                                  /* @Z30KPYA*/        00477000
         BALR  R14,0                  GET PSW COND CODE       @Z30KPYA  00478000
         STCM  R14,8,CCODE(RBPTR)     SAVE IT IN XSA OF SVRB  @Z30KPYA  00479000
*                   IF CC='00'B THEN/* VALIDITY CK OK?       @Z30KPYA*/ 00480000
         TM    CC(RBPTR),B'00110000'                               0207 00481000
         BNZ   @RF00207                                            0207 00482000
*                     DO;           /* YES                   @Z30KPYA*/ 00483000
*                       AREA=TIME;  /* PUT VALUE IN USER AREA      0209 00484000
*                                                            @Z30KPYA*/ 00485000
         L     @10,RESLTPTR(,RBPTR)                                0209 00486000
         MVC   AREA(8,@10),TIME(RBPTR)                             0209 00487000
*                       RETCODE=0;  /* INDICATE ALL IS WELL  @Z30KPYA*/ 00488000
         SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0210 00489000
*                     END;          /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00490000
*                   ELSE            /* VALIDITY CK FAILED    @Z30KPYA*/ 00491000
*                     RETCODE=12;   /* 10B ABEND NEEDED      @Z30KPYA*/ 00492000
         B     @RC00207                                            0212 00493000
@RF00207 LA    RETCODE,12                                          0212 00494000
*                   GEN CODE REFS(PSALITA,FLC);                    0213 00495000

*                                        /*REL LOCAL LOCK @Z30KPYA*/    00497000
         SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=LOCAL,                          @Z30KPYA**00498000
               RELATED=('VALIDITY CK INTF',(IEAVRT01,(NONE))) @Z30KPYA  00499000
*                   RFY                                            0214 00500000
*                    (R1,                                          0214 00501000
*                     R2,                                          0214 00502000
*                     R11,                                         0214 00503000
*                     R12,                                         0214 00504000
*                     R13,                                         0214 00505000
*                     R14) UNRSTD;  /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00506000
*                 END;              /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00507000
*               ELSE                /* NO VALIDITY CK NEEDED @Z30KPYA*/ 00508000
*                 AREA=TIME;        /* PLACE VALUE IN USER AREA    0216 00509000
*                                                            @Z30KPYA*/ 00510000
         B     @RC00199                                            0216 00511000
@RF00199 L     @14,RESLTPTR(,RBPTR)                                0216 00512000
         MVC   AREA(8,@14),TIME(RBPTR)                             0216 00513000
*               IF XSACLKNT='1'B THEN/* IF CLOCKS NOT INITIALIZED  0217 00514000
*                                                            @ZA11878*/ 00515000
@RC00199 TM    XSACLKNT(RBPTR),B'00000100'                         0217 00516000
         BNO   @RF00217                                            0217 00517000
*                 R0=0;             /* RETURN A TIME OF 0    @ZA11878*/ 00518000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               0218 00519000
*               ELSE                /* CLOCKS INITIALIZED    @ZA11878*/ 00520000
*                 R0=SAVR(1);       /* RETURN THE INPUT VALUE      0219 00521000
*                                                            @ZA11878*/ 00522000
         B     @RC00217                                            0219 00523000
@RF00217 L     R0,SAVR(,RBPTR)                                     0219 00524000
*             END;                                                 0220 00525000
*           ELSE                    /* HERE IF NOT MIC REQUEST       */ 00526000
*             DO;                                                  0221 00527000
         B     @RC00197                                            0221 00528000
@RF00197 DS    0H                                                  0222 00529000
*               RESPECIFY                                          0222 00530000
*                (R6,                                              0222 00531000
*                 R7) RSTD;                                        0222 00532000
*               R6=TIMELH;                                         0223 00533000
         L     R6,TIMELH(,RBPTR)                                   0223 00534000
*               R7=TIMERH;                                         0224 00535000
         L     R7,TIMERH(,RBPTR)                                   0224 00536000
*               IF SAVR(2,29:32)='0'X/* IF TU REQUESTED,             */ 00537000
*                 THEN              /* CONVERT TO TIMER UNITS        */ 00538000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00001111'                           0225 00539000
         BNZ   @RF00225                                            0225 00540000
*                 GENERATE REFS(KTU2);                             0226 00541000
                            SLDL  R6,13                                 00542000
                            D     R6,KTU2                               00543000
                            SLL     R7,1                                00544000
*               ELSE                /* HERE IF BIN OR DEC REQUEST    */ 00545000
*                 DO;               /* CONVERT TO                    */ 00546000
         B     @RC00225                                            0227 00547000
@RF00225 DS    0H                                                  0228 00548000
*                   GENERATE        /* HUNDREDTHS OF SECONDS         */ 00549000
*                       REFS(K10000)(D  R6,K10000);                0228 00550000
         D  R6,K10000                                                   00551000
*                   IF SAVR(2,29:32)='2'X/* IF DEC REQSTD            */ 00552000
*                     THEN          /* CONV TO HHMMSSTH              */ 00553000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00000010'                           0229 00554000
         BNO   @RF00229                                            0229 00555000
         TM    SAVR+7(RBPTR),B'00001101'                           0229 00556000
         BNZ   @RF00229                                            0229 00557000
*                     DO;                                          0230 00558000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0231 00559000
*                        (R0,                                      0231 00560000
*                         R1,                                      0231 00561000
*                         R2,                                      0231 00562000
*                         R13,                                     0231 00563000
*                         R14) RSTD;                               0231 00564000
*                       GENERATE;                                  0232 00565000
                                LA   R14,32      SHIFT COUNT            00566000
                                LA   R13,12      SET DIVISOR MASK       00567000
                                LA   R2,10       INITIAL DIVISOR        00568000
DECLOOP                         SR   R6,R6       CLEAR REMAINDER        00569000
                                DR   R6,R2       REMAINDER = DEC DIGIT  00570000
                                LR   R0,R6       SAVE THE DIGIT         00571000
                                SRDL R0,4        IN REGISTER 1          00572000
                                SH   R14,FOUR    ADJUST SHIFT COUNT     00573000
                                LTR  R7,R7       IF QUOTIENT 0 THEN     00574000
                                BZ   CONVEND     DONE. GO EXIT.         00575000
                                CL   R14,TWENTY4    CHANGE DIVISOR      00576000
                                BNL  DECLOOP        IF COUNT<24 FROM    00577000
                                XR   R2,R13         10 T0 6 T0 10 ETC   00578000
                                B    DECLOOP     LOOP                   00579000
CONVEND                         SRL  R1,0(R14)   HERE WHEN DONE         00580000
                                LR   R7,R1       HHMMSSTH IN R7         00581000
*                       RESPECIFY                                  0233 00582000
*                        (R1,                                      0233 00583000
*                         R2,                                      0233 00584000
*                         R13,                                     0233 00585000
*                         R14) UNRSTD;                             0233 00586000
*                     END;                                         0234 00587000
*                 END;                                             0235 00588000
@RF00229 DS    0H                                                  0236 00589000
*               R0=R7;              /* TIME TO OUTPUT REG 0  @ZA11878*/ 00590000
@RC00225 LR    R0,R7                                               0236 00591000
*               RETCODE=0;          /* INDICATE THAT ALL'S WELL      */ 00592000
         SLR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0237 00593000
*             END;                                                 0238 00594000
*         END;                                                     0239 00595000
@RC00197 DS    0H                                                  0240 00596000
*     END;                                                         0240 00597000
@RC00115 DS    0H                                                  0241 00598000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0241 00599000
*    (R1,                                                          0241 00600000
*     RETADDR) RSTD;                                               0241 00601000
@RC00112 DS    0H                                                  0242 00602000
*   R1=DATE;                        /* DATE TO OUTPUT REG 1  @ZA11878*/ 00603000
         L     R1,DATE(,RBPTR)                                     0242 00604000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0243 00605000
*    (R6,                                                          0243 00606000
*     R7) UNRSTD;                                                  0243 00607000
*   RETADDR=SAVR(3);                /* DO                            */ 00608000
         L     RETADDR,SAVR+8(,RBPTR)                              0244 00609000
*   IF RETCODE¬=0 THEN              /* IF POTENTIAL ABEND    @Z30KPYA*/ 00610000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0245 00611000
         BZ    @RF00245                                            0245 00612000
*     DO;                           /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00613000
*       IF RETCODE=12 THEN          /* 10B ABEND IF RETCODE=12     0247 00614000
*                                                            @Z30KPYA*/ 00615000
         C     RETCODE,@CF00986                                    0247 00616000
         BNE   @RF00247                                            0247 00617000
*         GEN CODE(ABEND X'10B',,,SYSTEM);/*                 @Z30KPYA*/ 00618000
         ABEND X'10B',,,SYSTEM                                          00619000
*       ELSE                        /* RETCODE NOT 0 OR 12   @Z30KPYA*/ 00620000
*         IF XSAERRET='0'B THEN     /* 20B ABEND IF RETCODE=8 AND  0249 00621000
*                                      ERRET NOT SPECIFIED   @Z30KPYA*/ 00622000
         B     @RC00247                                            0249 00623000
@RF00247 TM    XSAERRET(RBPTR),B'00010000'                         0249 00624000
         BNZ   @RF00249                                            0249 00625000
*           GEN CODE(ABEND X'20B',,,SYSTEM);/*               @Z30KPYA*/ 00626000
         ABEND X'20B',,,SYSTEM                                          00627000
*     END;                          /*                       @Z30KPYA*/ 00628000
*   RETURN;                         /* TIME ROUTINE EXIT POINT       */ 00629000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0252 00630000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0252 00631000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0252 00632000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0253 00633000
*    (R0,                                                          0253 00634000
*     R1,                                                          0253 00635000
*     RETADDR,                                                     0253 00636000
*     RETCODE) UNRSTD;                                             0253 00637000
*                                                                  0254 00638000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00639000
*/*                                                                  */ 00640000
*/*                      OTHERCLK SUBROUTINE                         */ 00641000
*/*                                                                  */ 00642000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00643000
*/*                                                                  */ 00644000
*/*        FUNCTION  - SEARCHES SYSTEM FOR A CPU WITH A GOOD TIME    */ 00645000
*/*                    OF DAY CLOCK AND THEN GETS THAT CPU TO        */ 00646000
*/*                    STORE ITS CLOCK INTO STCKAREA AND THE         */ 00647000
*/*                    CONDITION CODE INTO CCODE.                    */ 00648000
*/*                                                                  */ 00649000
*/*        INPUT     - 1. PROTECT KEY ZERO                           */ 00650000
*/*                    2. SUPERVISOR STATE                           */ 00651000
*/*                    3. RBPTR POINTING TO THE SVRB                 */ 00652000
*/*                    4. R14= RETURN ADDRESS                        */ 00653000
*/*                                                                  */ 00654000
*/*        ENVIRONMENT                                               */ 00655000
*/*        CHANGES   - NO REGISTERS SAVED                            */ 00656000
*/*                                                                  */ 00657000
*/*        OTHER RTNS                                                */ 00658000
*/*        USED      - RISGNL SHOULDER TAP                           */ 00659000
*/*                    PAGE FIX AND FREE                             */ 00660000
*/*                    WAIT                                          */ 00661000
*/*                                                                  */ 00662000
*/*        CALLERS   - TIME MAINLINE                                 */ 00663000
*/*                                                                  */ 00664000
*/*        OUTPUT    - IF SUCCESSFUL, TOD IN STCKAREA AND CCODE=0    */ 00665000
*/*                    IF UNSUCCESSFUL, CCODE¬=0                     */ 00666000
*/*                                                                  */ 00667000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00668000
*                                                                  0254 00669000
*OTHERCLK:                                                         0254 00670000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA,RETREG,NOENTREG);               0254 00671000
OTHERCLK DS    0H                                                  0255 00672000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0255 00673000
*    (PCCAPTR,                                                     0255 00674000
*     R6,                                                          0255 00675000
*     R11,                                                         0255 00676000
*     R12,                                                         0255 00677000
*     SLOTCNT,                                                     0255 00678000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0255 00679000
*   R6=R14;                         /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 00680000
         LR    R6,R14                                              0256 00681000
*   CCODE='FF'X;                    /* INITIALIZE CCODE¬=0           */ 00682000
         MVI   CCODE(RBPTR),X'FF'                                  0257 00683000
*   R11=ADDR(OTHERCLK);             /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00684000
         LA    R11,OTHERCLK                                        0258 00685000
*   R12=ADDR(TIMEEND);              /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00686000
         LA    R12,TIMEEND                                         0259 00687000
*   R13=ADDR(PGFIXECB);             /* SET REG FOR PAGE FIX INTF     */ 00688000
         LA    R13,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0260 00689000
*   PGFIXECB=0;                     /* INITIALIZE PAGE FIX ECB       */ 00690000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0261 00691000
         ST    @15,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0261 00692000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0262 00693000
         PGFIX   R,A=(R11),EA=(R12),ECB=(R13),LONG=N                    00694000
*   IF RETCODE=8 THEN               /* IF PAGE FIX IS PROCE  @OZ07159*/ 00695000
         C     RETCODE,@CF00036                                    0263 00696000
         BNE   @RF00263                                            0263 00697000
*     DO;                           /* THEN WAIT             @OZ07159*/ 00698000
*       R13=ADDR(PGFIXECB);         /* SET REG FOR WAIT              */ 00699000
         LA    R13,PGFIXECB(,RBPTR)                                0265 00700000
*       GENERATE;                                                  0266 00701000
         WAIT    1,ECB=(R13)                                            00702000
*     END;                          /*                       @OZ07159*/ 00703000
*   GENERATE REFS(PSALITA,FLC);                                    0268 00704000
@RF00263 DS    0H                                                  0268 00705000
         SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=DISP,MODE=UNCOND,                        CC00706000
               RELATED=('tpccc and tpcwork',IEAVRT01(NONE))             00707000
*   R11=ADDR(TPC);                                                 0269 00708000
         L     R11,TPCPTR(,CVTREG)                                 0269 00709000
*   R11->TPCCC='FF'X;               /* INITIALIZE TPCCC TO NON ZERO  */ 00710000
         MVI   TPCCC(R11),X'FF'                                    0270 00711000
*   DO SLOTCNT=DIM(PCCAT00P) TO 1   /* SCAN PCCAVT UNTIL ENTRIES     */ 00712000
*         BY-1 WHILE CCODE¬=0;      /* EXHAUSTED OR UNTIL A        0271 00713000
*                                      SUCCESSFUL STCK (CCODE=0)     */ 00714000
         LA    SLOTCNT,16                                          0271 00715000
@DL00271 CLI   CCODE(RBPTR),0                                      0271 00716000
         BE    @DC00271                                            0271 00717000
*     PCCAPTR=PCCAT00P(SLOTCNT);    /* GET PTR TO PCCA ENTRY         */ 00718000
         LR    @15,SLOTCNT                                         0272 00719000
         SLA   @15,2                                               0272 00720000
         L     @10,CVTPCCAT(,CVTREG)                               0272 00721000
         AL    @10,@CF02084                                        0272 00722000
         L     PCCAPTR,PCCAT00P(@15,@10)                           0272 00723000
*     IF PCCAPTR¬=0&                /* IF SLOT REPRESENTS A PCCA     */ 00724000
*         PCCANUTD='0'B             /* ENTRY WITH GOOD TOD CLK       */ 00725000
*       THEN                        /* SHOULDER TAP THAT CPU         */ 00726000
         LTR   PCCAPTR,PCCAPTR                                     0273 00727000
         BZ    @RF00273                                            0273 00728000
         TM    PCCANUTD(PCCAPTR),B'10000000'                       0273 00729000
         BNZ   @RF00273                                            0273 00730000
*       DO;                                                        0274 00731000
*         R12=ADDR(IEAVRTME);                                      0275 00732000
         LA    R12,IEAVRTME                                        0275 00733000
*         GENERATE REFS(CVT,CVTIPCRI)                              0276 00734000
*             (RISGNL SERIAL,CPU=(1),PARM=(11),EP=(12));           0276 00735000
         RISGNL SERIAL,CPU=(1),PARM=(11),EP=(12)                        00736000
*         STCKAREA=TPCWORK;         /* GET TODC VALUE (IF ANY)       */ 00737000
         L     @15,TPCPTR(,CVTREG)                                 0277 00738000
         MVC   STCKAREA(8,RBPTR),TPCWORK(@15)                      0277 00739000
*         CCODE=TPCCC;              /* GET RESULTING CC (IF ANY)     */ 00740000
         MVC   CCODE(1,RBPTR),TPCCC(@15)                           0278 00741000
*       END;                                                       0279 00742000
*   END;                                                           0280 00743000
@RF00273 BCTR  SLOTCNT,0                                           0280 00744000
         LTR   SLOTCNT,SLOTCNT                                     0280 00745000
         BP    @DL00271                                            0280 00746000
@DC00271 DS    0H                                                  0281 00747000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0281 00748000
         SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=DISP,                                   CC00749000
               RELATED=('tpccc and tpcwork',IEAVRT01(NONE))             00750000
*   R11=ADDR(OTHERCLK);             /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 00751000
         LA    R11,OTHERCLK                                        0282 00752000
*   R12=ADDR(TIMEEND);              /* SET REG FOR PAGE FREE INTF    */ 00753000
         LA    R12,TIMEEND                                         0283 00754000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0284 00755000
         PGFREE  R,A=(R11),EA=(R12)                                     00756000
*   R14=R6;                         /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 00757000
         LR    R14,R6                                              0285 00758000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0286 00759000
*    (PCCAPTR,                                                     0286 00760000
*     R6,                                                          0286 00761000
*     R11,                                                         0286 00762000
*     R12,                                                         0286 00763000
*     SLOTCNT,                                                     0286 00764000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0286 00765000
*   END;                            /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00766000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0287 00767000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0287 00768000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0287 00769000
*                                                                  0288 00770000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00771000
*/*                                                                  */ 00772000
*/*                IEAVRTME - ROUTINE FOR SHOULDER TAPPED CPU        */ 00773000
*/*                                                                  */ 00774000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00775000
*/*                                                                  */ 00776000
*/*               FUNCTION  - STORES TOD CLOCK INTO TPCWORK AND THE  */ 00777000
*/*                           RESULTING CONDITION CODE INTO TPCCC.   */ 00778000
*/*                                                                  */ 00779000
*/*               INPUT     - 1. PROTECT KEY ZERO                    */ 00780000
*/*                           2. SUPERVISOR STATE                    */ 00781000
*/*                           3. R1 POINTING TO THE TPC              */ 00782000
*/*                           4. RETURN ADDRESS IN R14               */ 00783000
*/*                                                                  */ 00784000
*/*               ENVIRONMENT                                        */ 00785000
*/*               CHANGES   - NO REGISTERS SAVED                     */ 00786000
*/*                                                                  */ 00787000
*/*               OTHER RTNS                                         */ 00788000
*/*               USED      - NONE                                   */ 00789000
*/*                                                                  */ 00790000
*/*               CALLERS   - EMERGENCY SIGNAL SLIH                  */ 00791000
*/*                                                                  */ 00792000
*/*               OUTPUT    - 1. TPCWORK SET WITH RESULTS OF A STCK  */ 00793000
*/*                           2. TPCCC SET WITH THE STCK COND CODE   */ 00794000
*/*                                                                  */ 00795000
*/*  *****************************************************************/ 00796000
*                                                                  0288 00797000
*IEAVRTME:                                                         0288 00798000
*   GENERATE CODE;                                                 0288 00799000
IEAVRTME DS    0H                                                  0288 00800000
         BALR  BASEREG,0                                                00801000
         USING *,BASEREG                                                00802000
         STCK  TPCWORK(R1)            STORE TIME OF DAY CLOCK           00803000
         MVI   TPCCC(R1),X'00'        SET CONDITION CODE TO ZERO        00804000
         BZ    EXIT                   BRANCH IF SUCCESSFUL              00805000
         MVI   TPCCC(R1),X'01'        SET CCODE¬=0 OF UNSUCCESSFUL      00806000
EXIT     BR     R14                   RETURN TO ICC                     00807000
*TIMEEND:                                                          0289 00808000
*   GEN(EQU *);                     /* ENDING ADDRESS FOR PGFIX/FREE    00809000
*                                                            @Z30KPYA*/ 00810000
TIMEEND  EQU *                                                          00811000
*   DECLARE                         /* COMMON VARIABLES              */ 00812000
*     I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                       0290 00813000
*     I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                       0290 00814000
*     I031P PTR(31) BASED,                                         0290 00815000
*     I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                       0290 00816000
*     I015P PTR(15) BASED,                                         0290 00817000
*     I008P PTR(8) BASED,                                          0290 00818000
*     I001C CHAR(1) BASED;                                         0290 00819000
*   END IGC0001A                                                   0291 00820000
*                                                                  0291 00821000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 00822000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPSA  )                                       */ 00823000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (CVT     )                                       */ 00824000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPCCAT)                                       */ 00825000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPCCA )                                       */ 00826000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IKJTCB  )                                       */ 00827000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHARB   )                                       */ 00828000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IKJRB   )                                       */ 00829000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IEAVVTPC)                                       */ 00830000
*                                                                  0291 00831000
*       ;                                                          0291 00832000
         B     @EL00001                                            0291 00833000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00834000
@CH02057 DC    H'1000'                                                  00835000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00836000
         DS    0F                                                       00837000

         DS    0F                                                       00839000
@CF00067 DC    F'1'                                                     00840000

         NOPR  ((@ENDDATD-@DATD)*16)                                    00852000
