*/* IF IT WAS NOT SPECIFIED, UNPACK THE PREVIOUSLY USED VALUE.       */ 00201000
*/*                                                                  */ 00202000
*/********************************************************************/ 00203000
*                                                                  0076 00204000
*     UNPK(TCWAWRK1(1:5),TCWAPGD(2:4));                            0076 00205000
*                                                                  0076 00206000
         B     @RC00074                                            0076 00207000
@RF00074 UNPK  TCWAWRK1(5,TCWAPTR),TCWAPGD+1(3,TCWAPTR)            0076 00208000
*/********************************************************************/ 00209000
*/*                                                                  */ 00210000
*/* CONVERT DAYS TO PACKED DECIMAL AND THEN TO BINARY.               */ 00211000
*/*                                                                  */ 00212000
*/********************************************************************/ 00213000
*                                                                  0077 00214000
*   PACK(TCWAWRK2,TCWAWRK1(3:5));                                  0077 00215000
@RC00074 PACK  TCWAWRK2(8,TCWAPTR),TCWAWRK1+2(3,TCWAPTR)           0077 00216000
*   CVB(DAYS,TCWAWRK2);                                            0078 00217000
*                                                                  0078 00218000
         CVB   DAYS,TCWAWRK2(,TCWAPTR)                             0078 00219000
*/********************************************************************/ 00220000
*/*                                                                  */ 00221000
*/* MAKE DAYS ZERO ORIGIN.                                           */ 00222000
*/*                                                                  */ 00223000
*/********************************************************************/ 00224000
*                                                                  0079 00225000
*   DAYS=DAYS-1;                                                   0079 00226000
*                                                                  0079 00227000
         BCTR  DAYS,0                                              0079 00228000
*/********************************************************************/ 00229000
*/*                                                                  */ 00230000
*/* CONVERT YEARS TO PACKED DECIMAL AND THEN TO BINARY.              */ 00231000
*/*                                                                  */ 00232000
*/********************************************************************/ 00233000
*                                                                  0080 00234000
*   PACK(TCWAWRK2,TCWAWRK1(1:2));                                  0080 00235000
         PACK  TCWAWRK2(8,TCWAPTR),TCWAWRK1(2,TCWAPTR)             0080 00236000
*   CVB(YEARS,TCWAWRK2);                                           0081 00237000
*                                                                  0081 00238000
         CVB   YEARS,TCWAWRK2(,TCWAPTR)                            0081 00239000
*/********************************************************************/ 00240000
*/*                                                                  */ 00241000
*/* THE FOLLOWING FORMULA IS EQUIVALENT TO (YEARS*365.25)-.25, DIS-  */ 00242000
*/* CARDING ANY FRACTIONAL PART OF THE RESULT.  THIS FORMULA GIVES   */ 00243000
*/* THE CORRECT NUMBER OF DAYS ELAPSED FOR FULL YEARS PASSED SINCE   */ 00244000
*/* THE EPOCH BECAUSE IN IT, THE SURPLUS .25 DAYS PER YEAR MINUS THE */ 00245000
*/* .25 DAYS WILL NOT ACCUMULATE TO A FULL DAY FOR THE FIRST TIME    */ 00246000
*/* UNTIL 5 YEARS HAS PASSED SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE EPOCH--THAT  */ 00247000
*/* IS UNTIL 1904 ( THE FIRST LEAP YEAR AFTER THE EPOCH) HAS PASSED. */ 00248000
*/*                                                                  */ 00249000
*/* WHEN 1904 HAS PASSED (AND IT IS 1905), THE ACCUMULATION IS 1 DAY */ 00250000
*/* (1.25-.25=1).  FROM THAT POINT ON, 1 DAY ACCUMULATES FOR EVERY   */ 00251000
*/* FOUR YEARS (EG. 2.25-.25 AFTER 1908, 3.25-.25 AFTER 1912, ETC.). */ 00252000
*/* FOR ANY YEARS IN BETWEEN, THE ACCUMULATION IS SOME INTEGER PLUS  */ 00253000
*/* .00 TO .75 MINUS THE CONSTANT .25 DAYS, AND IS DISCARDED.        */ 00254000
*/*                                                                  */ 00255000
*/********************************************************************/ 00256000
*                                                                  0082 00257000
*   DAYS=(((YEARS*DAYS4YRS)-1)/4)+DAYS;                            0082 00258000
*                                                                  0082 00259000
         LR    @00,YEARS                                           0082 00260000
         MH    @00,DAYS4YRS                                        0082 00261000
         BCTR  @00,0                                               0082 00262000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              0082 00263000
         D     @00,@CF00097                                        0082 00264000
         AR    DAYS,@01                                            0082 00265000
*/********************************************************************/ 00266000
*/*                                                                  */ 00267000
*/* MULTIPLY DAYS ELAPSED SINCE THE EPOCH BY THE NO. OF MINUTES PER  */ 00268000
*/* DAY AND ADD TO MINUTES ELAPSED SINCE LAST MIDNIGHT GIVING MINUTES*/ 00269000
*/* ELAPSED SINCE EPOCH.                                             */ 00270000
*/*                                                                  */ 00271000
*/********************************************************************/ 00272000
*                                                                  0083 00273000
*   MINUTES=(DAYS*MINSDAY)+MINUTES;                                0083 00274000
*                                                                  0083 00275000
         LR    @15,DAYS                                            0083 00276000
         MH    @15,MINSDAY                                         0083 00277000
         AR    MINUTES,@15                                         0083 00278000
*/********************************************************************/ 00279000
*/*                                                                  */ 00280000
*/* MULTIPLY MINUTES ELAPSED SINCE EPOCH BY MICROSECONDS PER MINUTE  */ 00281000
*/* AND ADD IN MICROSECONDS GIVING MICROSECONDS ELAPSED SINCE EPOCH. */ 00282000
*/*                                                                  */ 00283000
*/********************************************************************/ 00284000
*                                                                  0084 00285000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0084 00286000
*    (TMICSECL,                                                    0084 00287000
*     TMICSECR)RESTRICTED;                                         0084 00288000
*   TMICSECR=MINUTES;                                              0085 00289000
         LR    TMICSECR,MINUTES                                    0085 00290000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(TMICSECL,MICSMIN)(M     TMICSECL,MICSMIN);  0086 00291000
         M     TMICSECL,MICSMIN                                         00292000
*   TMICSECR=TMICSECR+MICSECS;                                     0087 00293000
*                                                                  0087 00294000
         ALR   TMICSECR,MICSECS                                    0087 00295000
*/********************************************************************/ 00296000
*/*                                                                  */ 00297000
*/* TEST THE ADDITION FOR A CARRY OUT OF THE LOW ORDER WORD.         */ 00298000
*/*                                                                  */ 00299000
*/********************************************************************/ 00300000
*                                                                  0088 00301000
*   BC(12,MICSTOCU);                                               0088 00302000
*                                                                  0088 00303000
         BC    12,MICSTOCU                                         0088 00304000
*/********************************************************************/ 00305000
*/*                                                                  */ 00306000
*/* IF THERE IS A CARRY, ADD 1 TO THE HIGH ORDER WORD.               */ 00307000
*/*                                                                  */ 00308000
*/********************************************************************/ 00309000
*                                                                  0089 00310000
*   TMICSECL=TMICSECL+1;                                           0089 00311000
*                                                                  0089 00312000
         AL    TMICSECL,@CF00105                                   0089 00313000
*/********************************************************************/ 00314000
*/*                                                                  */ 00315000
*/* SHIFT BIT 63, WHICH REPRESENTS 1 MICROSECOND, TO BIT 51, WHICH   */ 00316000
*/* REPRESENTS 1 MICROSECOND IN THE TOD CLOCK.                       */ 00317000
*/*                                                                  */ 00318000
*/********************************************************************/ 00319000
*                                                                  0090 00320000
*MICSTOCU:                                                         0090 00321000
*   SLDL(TMICSECL,12);                                             0090 00322000
*                                                                  0090 00323000
MICSTOCU SLDL  TMICSECL,12                                         0090 00324000
*/********************************************************************/ 00325000
*/*                                                                  */ 00326000
*/* TEST FOR SPECIFICATION OF THE GMT PARAMETER.                     */ 00327000
*/*                                                                  */ 00328000
*/********************************************************************/ 00329000
*                                                                  0091 00330000
*   IF GMT¬='1'B THEN                                              0091 00331000
*                                                                  0091 00332000
         TM    GMT(XSAPTR),B'00000100'                             0091 00333000
         BO    @RF00091                                            0091 00334000
*/********************************************************************/ 00335000
*/*                                                                  */ 00336000
*/* IF IT IS NOT SPECIFIED, A LOCAL VALUE WAS ENTERED, SO SUBTRACT   */ 00337000
*/* THE TIME ZONE CONSTANT FROM THE CALCULATED TOD CLOCK VALUE TO    */ 00338000
*/* OBTAIN A GMT VALUE WITH WHICH TO SET THE CLOCK.                  */ 00339000
*/*                                                                  */ 00340000
*/********************************************************************/ 00341000
*                                                                  0092 00342000
*     TMICSECL=TMICSECL-CVTTZ;                                     0092 00343000
*                                                                  0092 00344000
         L     @15,CVTPTR                                          0092 00345000
         SL    TMICSECL,CVTTZ(,@15)                                0092 00346000
*/********************************************************************/ 00347000
*/*                                                                  */ 00348000
*/* STORE THE CALCULATED TOD CLOCK VALUE.                            */ 00349000
*/*                                                                  */ 00350000
*/********************************************************************/ 00351000
*                                                                  0093 00352000
*   STM(TMICSECL,TMICSECR,TCWACVAL);                               0093 00353000
@RF00091 STM   TMICSECL,TMICSECR,TCWACVAL(TCWAPTR)                 0093 00354000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0094 00355000
*    (REG0,                                                        0094 00356000
*     REG1,                                                        0094 00357000
*     REG11,                                                       0094 00358000
*     REG12,                                                       0094 00359000
*     REG15)RESTRICTED;                                            0094 00360000
*                                                                  0094 00361000
*/********************************************************************/ 00362000
*/*                                                                  */ 00363000
*/* WAIT ON PAGE FIX.                                                */ 00364000
*/*                                                                  */ 00365000
*/********************************************************************/ 00366000
*                                                                  0095 00367000
*   REG1=ADDR(XSAECB);                                             0095 00368000
         LA    REG1,XSAECB(,XSAPTR)                                0095 00369000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(REG1)(WAIT  1,ECB=(1));                     0096 00370000
*                                                                  0096 00371000
         WAIT  1,ECB=(1)                                                00372000
*/********************************************************************/ 00373000
*/*                                                                  */ 00374000
*/* TELL THE OPERATOR TO DEPRESS THE TOD CLOCK SECURITY SWITCH AT    */ 00375000
*/* THE MOMENT THAT THE TIME THAT WAS ENTERED OCCURS.  THEN WAIT FOR */ 00376000
*/* HIM TO INDICATE THAT HE HAS RECEIVED THE MESSAGE.                */ 00377000
*/*                                                                  */ 00378000
*/********************************************************************/ 00379000
*                                                                  0097 00380000
*   REG11=ADDR(TCWATXT);            /* GET REPLY ADDRESS             */ 00381000
         LA    REG11,TCWATXT(,TCWAPTR)                             0097 00382000
*   REG12=ADDR(XSAECB);             /* GET ECB ADDRESS               */ 00383000
         LA    REG12,XSAECB(,XSAPTR)                               0098 00384000
*   XSAECB=0;                       /* CLEAR ECB                     */ 00385000
         SR    @03,@03                                             0099 00386000
         ST    @03,XSAECB(,XSAPTR)                                 0099 00387000
*   GENERATE CODE;                                                 0100 00388000
         WTOR 'IEA903A DEPRESS TOD CLOCK SECURITY SWITCH WHEN ENTERED TT00389000
               IME OCCURS',(11),40,(12),ROUTCDE=(1),                  **00390000
               MCSFLAG=(NOTIME),DESC=(2)                                00391000
*   REG1=ADDR(XSAECB);              /* GET ECB ADDRESS               */ 00392000
         LA    REG1,XSAECB(,XSAPTR)                                0101 00393000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(REG1)(WAIT  1,ECB=(1));                     0102 00394000
*                                                                  0102 00395000
         WAIT  1,ECB=(1)                                                00396000
*/********************************************************************/ 00397000
*/*                                                                  */ 00398000
*/* TEST FOR UNI-PROCESSOR.  IF STRICTLY UNI-PROCESSOR, GET THE      */ 00399000
*/* DISPATCHER LOCK, AND BRANCH AND LINK TO THE ROUTINE THAT WILL    */ 00400000
*/* SET TOD CLOCK.  IF NOT, INVOKE THE ROUTINE VIA INTER-PROCESSOR   */ 00401000
*/* COMMUNICATIONS.                                                  */ 00402000
*/*                                                                  */ 00403000
*/********************************************************************/ 00404000
*                                                                  0103 00405000
*   IF CSDMP='0'B THEN                                             0103 00406000
         L     @03,CVTPTR                                          0103 00407000
         L     @03,CVTCSD(,@03)                                    0103 00408000
         TM    CSDMP(@03),B'10000000'                              0103 00409000
         BNZ   @RF00103                                            0103 00410000
*     DO;                                                          0104 00411000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0105 00412000
*        (REG13)RESTRICTED;                                        0105 00413000
*       REG15=ADDR(DELTA7);         /* GET ENTRY POINT ADDRESS       */ 00414000
         LA    REG15,DELTA7                                        0106 00415000
*       REG1=TCWAPTR;               /* GET TOD CLOCK WORKAREA ADDRESS*/ 00416000
         LR    REG1,TCWAPTR                                        0107 00417000
*       GENERATE CODE REFS(REG15,PSALITA)SETS(REG14);              0108 00418000
*                                                    /*                 00419000
         SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=DISP,MODE=UNCOND,                        **00420000
               RELATED=('DISABLE FOR CPUT LOOP',(IEE6603D,(NONE)))      00421000
         BALR  REG14,REG15         BRANCH TO SET TOD CLOCK              00422000
         SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=DISP,                                   **00423000
               RELATED=('DISABLE FOR CPUT LOOP',(IEE6603D,(NONE)))  */  00424000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0109 00425000
*        (REG13)UNRESTRICTED;                                      0109 00426000
*     END;                                                         0110 00427000
*   ELSE                                                           0111 00428000
*                                                                  0111 00429000
*/********************************************************************/ 00430000
*/*                                                                  */ 00431000
*/* SET UP INTERFACE FOR IPC.                                        */ 00432000
*/*                                                                  */ 00433000
*/********************************************************************/ 00434000
*                                                                  0111 00435000
*     DO;                                                          0111 00436000
         B     @RC00103                                            0111 00437000
@RF00103 DS    0H                                                  0112 00438000
*       REG11=TCWAPTR;              /* ADDR TCWA TO REG 11           */ 00439000
         LR    REG11,TCWAPTR                                       0112 00440000
*       REG1=EVAL(TCWAPTR+LENGTH(TCWA))->TCWAPCCA;/* ADDRESS OF PCCA    00441000
*                                      TO REG 1                      */ 00442000
         LA    @03,112                                             0113 00443000
         AR    @03,TCWAPTR                                         0113 00444000
         L     REG1,TCWAPCCA(,@03)                                 0113 00445000
*       REG12=ADDR(DELTA7);         /* ENTRY POINT ADDR TO REG 12    */ 00446000
*                                                                  0114 00447000
         LA    REG12,DELTA7                                        0114 00448000
*/********************************************************************/ 00449000
*/*                                                                  */ 00450000
*/* ISSUE A SIGP TO GET A TOD CLOCK SET WITH THE CORRECT GMT.        */ 00451000
*/*                                                                  */ 00452000
*/********************************************************************/ 00453000
*                                                                  0115 00454000
*       GENERATE CODE REFS(CVTIPCRI,CVT)                           0115 00455000
*           (RISGNL SERIAL,CPU=(1),EP=(12),PARM=(11));             0115 00456000
         RISGNL SERIAL,CPU=(1),EP=(12),PARM=(11)                        00457000
*     END;                                                         0116 00458000
*                                                                  0116 00459000
*/********************************************************************/ 00460000
*/*                                                                  */ 00461000
*/* FREE THE FIXED PAGE.                                             */ 00462000
*/*                                                                  */ 00463000
*/********************************************************************/ 00464000
*                                                                  0117 00465000
*   REG1=ADDR(DELTA7);              /* GET PTR TO START OF SIGP'D TO    00466000
*                                      ROUTINE                       */ 00467000
@RC00103 LA    REG1,DELTA7                                         0117 00468000
*   REG15=ADDR(DEL7END);            /* GET PTR TO END OF SIGP'D TO 0118 00469000
*                                      ROUTINE                       */ 00470000
         LA    REG15,DEL7END                                       0118 00471000
*   GENERATE CODE(PGFREE  R,A=(1),EA=(15));                        0119 00472000
*                                                                  0119 00473000
         PGFREE  R,A=(1),EA=(15)                                        00474000
*/********************************************************************/ 00475000
*/*                                                                  */ 00476000
*/* RESTORE THE CALLER'S RETURN ADDRESS TO THE RETURN REGISTER.      */ 00477000
*/*                                                                  */ 00478000
*/********************************************************************/ 00479000
*                                                                  0120 00480000
*   REG14=RETSAVE;                                                 0120 00481000
         LR    REG14,RETSAVE                                       0120 00482000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0121 00483000
*    (REG11,                                                       0121 00484000
*     REG12,                                                       0121 00485000
*     TMICSECL,                                                    0121 00486000
*     TMICSECR)UNRESTRICTED;                                       0121 00487000
*                                                                  0121 00488000
*/********************************************************************/ 00489000
*/*                                                                  */ 00490000
*/* SET CSECT ID FIELD OF XSA TO 0 TO INDICATE THAT IEE6603D IS NO   */ 00491000
*/* LONGER IN CONTROL.  RETURN TO IEE0603D.                          */ 00492000
*/*                                                                  */ 00493000
*/********************************************************************/ 00494000
*                                                                  0122 00495000
*   CSECTCDE='00'X;                                                0122 00496000
         MVI   CSECTCDE(XSAPTR),X'00'                              0122 00497000
*   RETURN;                                                        0123 00498000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0123 00499000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0123 00500000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0123 00501000
*                                                                  0124 00502000
*/********************************************************************/ 00503000
*/*                                                                  */ 00504000
*/* THIS ROUTINE IS INVOKED VIA THE IPC.  IT ATTEMPTS TO SET THE TOD */ 00505000
*/* CLOCK WITH THE VALUE PASSED TO IT.                               */ 00506000
*/*                                                                  */ 00507000
*/********************************************************************/ 00508000
*                                                                  0124 00509000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0124 00510000
*     TCWA BASED(REG1);             /* REG1 NOW POINTING TO TCWA     */ 00511000
*                                                                  0124 00512000
*/********************************************************************/ 00513000
*/*                                                                  */ 00514000
*/* TURN OF THE TOD CLOCK SYNCHRONIZATION BIT IN CONTROL REG 0 SO    */ 00515000
*/* THAT THE CLOCK WILL NOT STOP WHEN IT IS SET.  THEN INITIALIZE    */ 00516000
*/* THE 1 MINUTE TIME-OUT LOOP.                                      */ 00517000
*/*                                                                  */ 00518000
*/********************************************************************/ 00519000
*                                                                  0125 00520000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(REG15)(USING *,REG15  ADDRESSABILITY FOR CODE);  00521000
         USING *,REG15  ADDRESSABILITY FOR CODE                         00522000
*DELTA7:                                                           0126 00523000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(REG1)SETS(TCWACTL)                          0126 00524000
*       (STCTL 0,0,TCWACTL(REG1)  SAVE CONTROL REG 0);             0126 00525000
DELTA7   STCTL 0,0,TCWACTL(REG1)  SAVE CONTROL REG 0                    00526000
*   TCSTOP='0'B;                    /* TURN OFF SYNCHRONIZATION BIT  */ 00527000
         NI    TCSTOP(REG1),B'11011111'                            0127 00528000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(TCWACTL,REG1)SETS(TCWAA1,TCWAA2);           0128 00529000
*                                                                  0128 00530000
        LCTL  0,0,TCWACTL(REG1)  RESTORE CONTROL REG 0                  00531000
        STPT  TCWAA1(REG1)       STORE STARTING TIME VALUE              00532000
        STPT  TCWAA2(REG1)       STORE ENDING TIME VALUE                00533000
*/********************************************************************/ 00534000
*/*                                                                  */ 00535000
*/* TURN ON THE TOD CLOCK NOT SET INDICATOR.                         */ 00536000
*/*                                                                  */ 00537000
*/********************************************************************/ 00538000
*                                                                  0129 00539000
*   TCGNSET='1'B;                                                  0129 00540000
*                                                                  0129 00541000
         OI    TCGNSET(REG1),B'00001000'                           0129 00542000
*/********************************************************************/ 00543000
*/*                                                                  */ 00544000
*/* LOOP ON A SET CLOCK INSTRUCTION UNTIL THE OPERATOR DEPRESSES THE */ 00545000
*/* SECURITY SWITCH ALLOWING THE CLOCK TO BE SET, OR THE ALLOTTED    */ 00546000
*/* TIME INTERVAL EXPIRES.                                           */ 00547000
*/*                                                                  */ 00548000
*/********************************************************************/ 00549000
*                                                                  0130 00550000
*   DO WHILE TCWAA1L-TCWAA2L<INTERVAL&TCGNSET='1'B;                0130 00551000
         B     @DE00130                                            0130 00552000
@DL00130 DS    0H                                                  0131 00553000
*     GENERATE CODE REFS(TCWACVAL,REG1)(SCK   TCWACVAL(REG1));     0131 00554000
*                                                                  0131 00555000
         SCK   TCWACVAL(REG1)                                           00556000
*/********************************************************************/ 00557000
*/*                                                                  */ 00558000
*/* TEST FOR A SUCCESSFUL EXECUTION OF THE SET CLOCK INSTRUCTION.    */ 00559000
*/*                                                                  */ 00560000
*/********************************************************************/ 00561000
*                                                                  0132 00562000
*     BC(7,STCPUT);                                                0132 00563000
*                                                                  0132 00564000
         BC    7,STCPUT                                            0132 00565000
*/********************************************************************/ 00566000
*/*                                                                  */ 00567000
*/* IF THE TOD CLOCK IS SET, TURN OFF THE TOD CLOCK NOT SET          */ 00568000
*/* INDICATOR.  WHETHER SET OR NOT, STORE A NEW ENDING VALUE.        */ 00569000
*/*                                                                  */ 00570000
*/********************************************************************/ 00571000
*                                                                  0133 00572000
*     TCGNSET='0'B;                                                0133 00573000
         NI    TCGNSET(REG1),B'11110111'                           0133 00574000
*STCPUT:                                                           0134 00575000
*     GENERATE CODE REFS(REG1)SETS(TCWAA2)(STPT  TCWAA2(REG1));    0134 00576000
STCPUT   STPT  TCWAA2(REG1)                                             00577000
*   END;                                                           0135 00578000
*                                                                  0135 00579000
@DE00130 L     @12,TCWAA1L(,REG1)                                  0135 00580000
         SL    @12,TCWAA2L(,REG1)                                  0135 00581000
         CL    @12,INTERVAL                                        0135 00582000
         BNL   @DC00130                                            0135 00583000
         TM    TCGNSET(REG1),B'00001000'                           0135 00584000
         BO    @DL00130                                            0135 00585000
@DC00130 DS    0H                                                  0136 00586000
*/********************************************************************/ 00587000
*/*                                                                  */ 00588000
*/* RETURN TO THE EXTERNAL SECOND LEVEL INTERRUPT HANDLER.           */ 00589000
*/*                                                                  */ 00590000
*/********************************************************************/ 00591000
*                                                                  0136 00592000
*   GENERATE CODE REFS(REG14)(BR    REG14);                        0136 00593000
         BR    REG14                                                    00594000
*DEL7END:                                                          0137 00595000
*   GENERATE CODE(EQU   *);                                        0137 00596000
DEL7END  EQU   *                                                        00597000
*   END IEE6603D                                                   0138 00598000
*                                                                  0138 00599000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 00600000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHAPSA  )                                       */ 00601000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IEAVVTPC)                                       */ 00602000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (CVT     )                                       */ 00603000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IEEXSA  )                                       */ 00604000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IHACSD  )                                       */ 00605000
*                                                                  0138 00606000
*       ;                                                          0138 00607000
         B     @EL00001                                            0138 00608000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00609000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00610000
         DS    0F                                                       00611000
IEE6603D CSECT                                                          00612000
         DS    0F                                                       00613000
@CF00105 DC    F'1'                                                     00614000
@CF00097 DC    F'4'                                                     00615000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          00616000
         DS    0D                                                       00617000
@ENDDATD EQU   *                                                        00618000
IEE6603D CSECT                                                          00619000
         NOPR  ((@ENDDATD-@DATD)*16)                                    00620000
         DS    0F                                                       00621000
@SIZDATD DC    AL1(255)                                                 00622000
         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      00623000
         DS    0D                                                       00624000
MICSMIN  DC    F'60000000'                                              00625000
INTERVAL DC    F'60'                                                    00626000
         ORG   INTERVAL                                                 00627000
@NM00001 DS    CL2                                                      00628000
MINSHOUR DS    FL2                                                      00629000
         ORG   INTERVAL+4                                               00630000
MICSSEC  DC    F'1000000'                                               00631000
MINSDAY  DC    H'1440'                                                  00632000
DAYS4YRS DC    H'1461'                                                  00633000
DAYSTART DC    CL6'000000'                                              00634000
PATCH66  DC    CL50' '                                                  00635000
